121020002.Text: Do you wish to transfer to a live customer support representative?

121020003.Text: Please transfer me to a live customer support representative, thank you.

121020004.Text: I'm afraid you might have the wrong person.

121020005.Text: Sorry, I think I have the wrong person.

121030000.Text: Do you happen to know Mei? Are you her relative?

121030001.Text: I'm her employer. Did something happen to Mei?

121030002.Text: She got rear-ended by a speeding starskiff and got thrown out from her starskiff

121030003.Text: But she seems to be fine now. The Alchemy Commission's team of healers was able to get onsite very quickly

121030004.Text: Mei got into a little starskiff traffic accident and is currently receiving treatment

121030005.Text: But she seems to be fine now. The Alchemy Commission's team of healers was able to get onsite very quickly

121030006.Text: A traffic accident? OK... where is she now? I'll be right over

121030007.Text: ...However, the set of Butterfly Immersia is a bit busy right now... I might not make it in time. But I'll try to get there right away. Sorry to have troubled you so far. May I have your name, please?

121030008.Text: I'm just a temporary speed tester dispatched by the Sky-Faring Commission.

121030010.Text: I'm just a passing trailblazer. My name's not important

121040100.Text: Are you at the Alchemy Commission yet? The Sky-Faring Commission has some questions for Mei

121040101.Text: Have you seen Mei yet? The Sky-Faring Commission has some questions for her

121040102.Text: I just arrived and heard some people at the Alchemy Commission say that Mei left when no one was looking

121040103.Text: Oh, this girl! So obstinate and stubborn!

121040104.Text: I asked around and found out that there are some missing pages for some "notes"? Mei seems determined to find them

121040105.Text: You have a few pages with you, right?

121040106.Text: I found her notes at the accident site and found your contact details

121040107.Text: I had taken leave for this, but things on set are pretty busy. I have to go back now. I just can't run around following her everywhere. I already paid for her medical bill, so please tell her to go back to the apothecary as soon as possible

121040109.Text: Luhui, I want to ask you something

Choices.Text: Are you at the Alchemy Commission already?

121030100.Text: The Sky-Faring Commission has already apprehended the culprit. No need to worry about the subsequent penalties and compensation

121030101.Text: Sorry for troubling you with all this. I'll help Mei with the subsequent penalties. But I'm a little confused. Do I need to continue talking with Mei about her dismissal...?

121030102.Text: In employment, is the exchange of services for payment the most important thing? Or is it the interpersonal relationship it created?

121030103.Text: You two are in an employment relationship. Service is exchanged for payment. While it's good to have a healthy relationship between you, this should be distinct from the professional relationship

121030104.Text: I do believe that money is perhaps the most reliable value indicator in all employment. But in the end, all the money in the world is only material possession

121030105.Text: You'll miss out on a lot of things that you can't put a price tag on, like the emotional bond between you two

121030106.Text: I'm just an outsider. My opinion isn't important to the relationship between you two

121030107.Text: You might've come to me for my opinion, but I think you already know the answer

121030108.Text: In that case, both Mei and I are very grateful for you. Let's meet in Starskiff Haven. I still have something for you to show my appreciation

121030109.Text: ...I don't know why, but with you, I'm able to say things I could never say before

Choices.Text: Being paid for labor is more important
It seems you already have your answer

121040000.Text: {NICKNAME}, Miss Xikui gave me your contact details. I'm Tantan. I have this to ask. Has the victim already left the scene?

121040001.Text: The Alchemy Commission's healers arrived onsite and already took Mei away

121040002.Text: Do you have Mei's contact details? The speeding starskiff is already gone and I want to ask the victim for details about the starskiff responsible for this

121040003.Text: I'll try to get in touch, but don't get your hopes up.

121040004.Text: Okay. I already talked with the Sky-Faring Commission. Soon there'll be further investigations for any other clues left at the scene

121050000.Text:
{NICKNAME}, is this your number? I am Official Dahao from the Realm-Keeping Commission Chancery.
As you are aware, there's been some... minor issues on the Luofu recently. Anyways, I was hoping you could help me with something

121050001.Text: But I'm not from Xianzhou. I shouldn't interfere with official business

121050003.Text: I'm just an Outworlder. I might not be able to help...

121050007.Text: Sorry. You might have misunderstood. I meant if you can take some time out of your busy schedule to help us, the Realm-Keeping Commission Chancery would be very grateful and will provide appropriate rewards

121050008.Text:
Please don't spread the following information.
After the incident, the general and the master diviner drew up a list, and want the Sky-Faring Commission and us to check all the people who traveled at certain times to certain locations. They suspect someone smuggled "contraband" onto the Luofu...

121050009.Text: The Commissions checked everything against the records and didn't find anyone suspicious, so we're here to ask your assistance...

121050011.Text: No, that's not what I mean

121050012.Text: Um... Okay? So what do you want me to do?

121050013.Text: The Xianzhou Alliance is not a part of the Interastral Peace Corporation's commercial sphere and does not share much information with the IPC. For one, we are not linked with their law enforcement system... If a criminal wanted by the IPC sneaked onto a Xianzhou ship, we would have no means of immediately detecting them

121050014.Text: It takes time and effort to send a formal request to the IPC to check, so the general advised us to seek help from the Astral Express Crew to filter the list for any suspicious persons

121050015.Text: If you can, please bring a few companions with you to help us go through the data.

Choices.Text: Could I actually manage to help you?
How do I fit in here?

121060000.Text: I tried fixing some other relevant recordings in the cycrane, and I found this part about Luocha

121060001.Text: I've left it with the Foursquare Mirror. Please have a look when you can. However, I still lean towards Mr. Luocha having nothing to do with this

121060003.Text: You're welcome. I'm just doing my job

121060004.Text: Got it. We'll be there soon

121030200.Text: After some thought, I think I should tell you this. After all, you've already helped us so much thus far

121030201.Text: I've renewed the contract with Mei

121030202.Text: As far as the level of service is concerned, Mei is not quite there. But admittedly, I am not a perfect employer either. The important thing is that I'm not going to dwell on a "fair price" anymore

121030203.Text: Mei showed my family a sincerity that can never be bought with money. I don't want to let her down

121030204.Text: Thank you again, and I wish you all the best

121090001.Text: Um, I'm Liangmu. You healed me, remember? I wanna ask for your help with something

121090002.Text: Who? Liangmu? I don't remember that name

121090003.Text: Oh, you've forgotten about me... You and Lady Bailu saved me in Cloudford

121090005.Text: Thanks to you, my condition is cured. The Sky-Faring Commission is planning to deport me... Now I have to leave Xianzhou

121090006.Text: I don't know why, but I can't contact Banxia at all. I've left her some gifts and a letter, and I hope you can give those to her

121090007.Text: I've mailed the package to Heron Express at Starskiff Haven and left your details with them. Please remember to pick it up

121100002.Text: There's a package for Banxia. I want to unwrap it with you, if that's okay

121100003.Text: Okay! Let's meet at Starskiff Haven!

121100004.Text: Banxia shouldn't mind if we unwrap these gifts for her

121130000.Text: Do you have some time? Please come back to the Realm-Keeping Commission when you can. I've fixed some of the recordings and there is a section you might find interesting

121130001.Text: Miss Jingyan's help is right on time. Thank you so much. We'll head there immediately

121130002.Text: Okay. Please be careful on the way here

121150001.Text: {NICKNAME}, you don't happen to be at Stargazer Navalia right now, are you?

121150002.Text: Yea, I just happened to be handling some stuff here

121150004.Text: How did you know? Miss Xikui, you're not stalking me, are you?

121150005.Text: Sorry, now's not the time for jokes

121150006.Text: I saw on cycrane system that you were nearby

121150007.Text: There's an important task I need your help with. It's really urgent

121150008.Text: The Exalting Sanctum's sky dome malfunctioned half a dual-hour ago. It was probably caused by the unusual yinyang phenomena from Ambrosial Arbor's new growth

121150009.Text: The technical details are complicated, so I won't elaborate. In short, one district has a serious problem, and it's about to explode

121150010.Text: The entire Luofu has yet to fully recover from all the chaos, and there's no one available to handle this emergency. Fortunately, there is an office worker in the Sky-Faring Commission who jumped on a starskiff and flew to the sky dome to carry out an emergency fix

121150011.Text: But that starskiff also broke down during the rescue (probably due to the yinyang phenomena again) and lost contact over Stargazer Navalia. It may have been forced to land or even crashed

121150012.Text: I've already informed the Cloud Knights to send reinforcements asap

121150013.Text: But one second can mean the difference between life and death for this kind of thing. Can you folks please go take a look first?

121150014.Text: "You folks"? Is there someone else here?

121150015.Text: Yes, Mr. Yang is also nearby

121150018.Text: I'm still trying to find out

121150019.Text: Your friend, Mr. Yang, is also nearby. I've already contacted him

121150020.Text: Anyways, try to find a vantage point in Stargazer Navalia and use a cycrane to locate the starskiff, I'm counting on you folks

121150021.Text: Also... this office worker is a bit special

121150022.Text: I implore you both to do everything in your power to save her life

121160000.Text: Hey there. I heard folks from the Artisanship Commission say that you helped clear the Ambrosial Arbor coils. You're indeed as saintly as the general says you are

121160001.Text: Saintly? That doesn't sound much like a compliment

121160002.Text: Don't beat around the bush. What's the matter?

121160003.Text: I am brave and kind, and I love to help others.

121160004.Text: Of course it's a compliment. I thank you from the bottom of my heart. Only when busy people get busy do slackers get a chance to slack off

121160005.Text: But, based on your past experience, won't you get a sort of a hunch when I message flatteries to you?

121160006.Text: ...A hunch? Like, this person wants something from me?

121160007.Text: So, what do you want from me?

121160008.Text: How about this? You recall the message now, and we forget about the whole thing

121160010.Text:
It seems that you are already used to the pleasantries people use on Xianzhou, and know when the work will come.
You will go far, young {F#lady}{M#man}! I believe you will soon understand my three basic principles for happiness at work

121160011.Text: But the trouble comes from me this time. Please don't shrug it off and do help me

121160012.Text: Great! A brave and kind person like you can definitely help me

121160013.Text: Do you remember the craftsman apprentice named Chengjie from the Artisanship Commission?

121160015.Text: Chengjie, the apprentice... I think I remember him

121160016.Text: It's okay if you don't remember. Come to the Artisanship Commission. I'll show him to you

121160017.Text: I was sent here by the master diviner to assist the Artisanship Commission in assessing the damages

121160018.Text: Everything was going well, but now the situation with Chengjie is getting beyond my scope of work...

121160019.Text: Can you come over to find me? I am at the Artisanship Commission's port

Choices.Text: It doesn't sound like a compliment to me.
Sounds like you need a favor
What do you want from me?
Can I pretend not to know?

121170000.Text: Our starskiff went off course. How's the situation on your end?

121170003.Text: Yes. How's the situation on your end?

121170004.Text: We caught Kafka, but it was too easy. It was kinda odd

121170005.Text: We caught Kafka and went to the Divination Commission

121170006.Text: What about Kafka's companion? Did you see Blade?

121170007.Text: Kafka was alone when we caught her. What's the matter?

121170008.Text: He ran away. Dunno where he is

121170009.Text: Be careful. He is very dangerous.

121170010.Text: I'll shake off the Cloud Knights and catch up to you.

121170012.Text: Wait. What's going on at your end?

Choices.Text: We went to the Divination Commission
That man is out there somewhere
What's going on at your end?

121180000.Text: {NICKNAME}, come to the Divination Commission alone. I'll send you the coordinates

121180003.Text: Kafka... How are you still on the Luofu?

121180004.Text: I can't leave, need your help

121180005.Text: You say you're Kafka? Where's the proof?

121180008.Text: Don't waste your effort, I won't heed your requests

121180009.Text: Is that so? But I really need your help

121180010.Text: Bladie's mara symptoms are getting serious, I can't leave before he recovers

121180011.Text: But you know, the bounty on his head has not been canceled yet, he is still the top wanted criminal on the Xianzhou

121180012.Text: I need you {NICKNAME}, come find me

121180013.Text: Where are you? Send me your coordinates

121180014.Text: Give up, Kafka, I won't be going

121180015.Text: I still want to use this number, so don't contact me again

121180016.Text: You have received a location message sent by an anonymous sender.

121151001.Text: {NICKNAME}, did you learn anything from General Jing Yuan?

121151002.Text: Xikui said Mom's busy, so I'm headed back to the Sky-Faring Commission

121151003.Text: If you did learn something, can you come meet up with me?

121151004.Text: I want to ask my Sky-Faring Commission colleagues as much as I can... but I don't know how to start...

121151005.Text: Do you know someone called "Caiyi"? I heard she was your mother's best friend

121151006.Text: Jing Yuan did mention someone named "Caiyi," and said you were very close to her

121151008.Text: I actually guessed there would be some connection

121151009.Text: It's hard to explain over text. Let's meet up

121200000.Text: Hi, {NICKNAME}. I got your contact details from Miss Qingque

121200001.Text: I'm trying to decipher my master's plans. By the Reignbow, I feel like I'm overflowing with inspiration!

121200002.Text: I want to talk to someone about my ideas. Do you have the time?

121200003.Text: I won't be able to understand what you say...

121200004.Text: Hehehe, I just want someone to chat with. Just treat it as listening to a new friend's rants.

121200005.Text: I charge a lot for counseling!

121200006.Text: The user you have messaged is currently unavailable

121200007.Text: Have you talked to Qingque about your inspirations?

121200008.Text: I have. She said she's too busy and doesn't have time, and asked me to find you

121200009.Text: Qingque and "being busy" are like fire and ice

121200010.Text: What does that mean? Is that some new proverb?

121200011.Text: Fire and ice are so unrelated, they're practically incompatible

121200012.Text: Um, I actually don't have time either

121200013.Text: But Miss Qingque said you're in Xianzhou as a tourist, and must have plenty of free time. She also said the secret faction you belong to loves to help people. Why else would you help the general and save us at the Artisanship Commission?

121200014.Text: What did I do to offend Qingque?

121200016.Text: I really need someone to supervise me. I'll definitely pay you for it!

Choices.Text: The user you have messaged is currently unavailable

121220000.Text: Ahhh, {NICKNAME}, I want to talk to you about something...

121220001.Text: I feel like I'm losing motivation.

121220002.Text: Is your starskiff design almost done?

121220003.Text: No. There's a lot more to go

121220004.Text: Ahhh, but whenever I think about how much work still needs to be done, I feel it'd be ages before I fulfill my master's dream

121220005.Text: I'm so useless. I still can't practice on my own after more than a century...

121220006.Text: Honestly, it feels like I'm supervising your work

121220007.Text: What kind of invention needs an external supervisor?

121220008.Text: Sorry. I'm so useless. I still can't practice on my own after more than a century...

121220009.Text: Say, {NICKNAME}, can you come and scold me face-to-face?

121220010.Text: The "cheer up" emotes Miss Qingque sends just aren't enough. They're not hitting the right spot...

121220011.Text: If you can scold me really hard  make me feel shame and motivation from the depths of my soul  then I can finish my master's work!

121220012.Text: You've got weird preferences. I've never heard of a request like that

121220013.Text: Please! Master Ryan used to scold me to cheer me up, too. His scolding always managed to kick me back into action!

121220015.Text: If a few angry words are enough to motivate people into fulfilling their dreams, then the universe would be full of accomplished daydreams by now

121220016.Text: You don't think that'd be enough? Then, maybe apply an appropriate amount of corporal punishment, too?

121220017.Text: I heard from Master Gongshu that you used only a stick to beat back the monsters. Maybe you can do the same to me... but you'd need to control your strength.

Choices.Text: Never heard of a request like that...
Would just a few angry words be enough?

121230000.Text: I'm sorry. I was the one who begged you to start all this, but now I'm also the one thinking of quitting...

121230001.Text: I finally understand why you still can't practice on your own after two hundred years in the Artisanship Commission

121230002.Text: It's my mistake to waste time on someone like you

121230004.Text: Don't be sorry. It's always difficult to accomplish anything of value

121230005.Text: Giving up is something that's happening in this universe every second... the people who bear the pain and see things to completion are the most amazing of us all

121230007.Text: You really don't need to push yourself like this

121230008.Text: What would completing one skiff accomplish? I understand it might mean something special to you, but if we step back...

121230009.Text: Everything humans do is meaningless. Give it a few more centuries, and who is going to remember the shame and hard work of a single apprentice in the Artisanship Commission?

121230012.Text: I will finish the remaining work. Please come and see it when I'm done... just wait for my good news

Choices.Text: What a waste of my time...
Take a step back. Don't push yourself

121240000.Text: Hey, I'm gonna cut to the chase

121240001.Text: Have you heard from Chengjie lately?

121240003.Text: Wow, you sure forget things fast

121240004.Text: Lemme show you some keywords to jog your memory

121240007.Text: The person who only worked on his dream for three days

121240009.Text: You either only have seven seconds of memory, or you haven't talked to him for too long, or your enthusiasm was hurt by his laziness...

121240010.Text: I remember him now. But we haven't talked for a while

121240011.Text: We haven't talked for a while

121240012.Text: Chengjie told me to wait for news, but he never sent anything

121240013.Text: I'm not a close friend of his, but since he's my game mate, I'm still quite worried whether his mental state is...

121240014.Text: Is fit to play with me in the future

121240015.Text: So, let's go check up on him. I'll see you at the Artisanship Commission

Choices.Text: We haven't talked for a while
He told me to wait for updates
We haven't talked for a while

121250000.Text: {NICKNAME}, do you still remember when we watched the starskiffs go to and fro at Starskiff Haven?

121250001.Text: Back then, I thought I could rely on my momentary impulsiveness to complete the starskiff design. "An average apprentice fulfilled his dead master's wishes" ...Wouldn't that be a good story?

121250002.Text: If that's how it turned out, then it'd be a good story. But it didn't work out

121250003.Text: How can an average apprentice fulfill their master's wishes so easily? That's too idealistic

121250005.Text: Oh right, you've helped me so much, and I haven't thanked you properly yet

121250006.Text: Could you please come to Starskiff Haven? I'll wait for you on the bridge where we watched starskiffs together

121260103.Text: That's good. I've always believed in your abilities

121260104.Text: Very well. I'm now a member of the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus

121260107.Text: Someone just reported in... did you save a Cloud Knight?

121260109.Text: I wouldn't call it saving. We had a successful collaboration

121260110.Text: Thank you very much for your help. That Cloud Knight had handed over all his intel to the Seat of Divine Foresight

121260111.Text: If it weren't for your help, he'd have had a hard time getting away

121260113.Text: As you've already infiltrated the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus, please keep monitoring their activities

121260114.Text: I've mentioned before that a Cloud Knight named Zhixin went missing a few months ago

121260115.Text: I want to know what happened to him, dead or alive... so I can give an answer to his family.

121260116.Text: Let's avoid contacting each other from here on. If you are seen going in and out of the Seat of Divine Foresight, those disciples are sure to become suspicious of you

121260117.Text: Please come back in one piece. Otherwise, the general will be quite upset with me

121260118.Text: Is there anything I should focus on?

121270101.Text: Gray Peony, did you get the stuff?

121270102.Text: I've got it. Where are we meeting?

121270104.Text: The place where we copy scripture

121270105.Text: The person in charge wants to see you ASAP

121280101.Text: {TEXTJOIN#24}, were you the one who found all the cycranes?

121280103.Text: You got the wrong person. I dunno anything abt {TEXTJOIN#24}

121280104.Text: Don't worry, I didn't. I checked Heron Express' backend data

121280105.Text: However, you can continue to pretend you're not {TEXTJOIN#24}

121280111.Text: I'm the one who implemented the sentience program in the cycranes

121280112.Text: I received a parcel. The sender is... probably you. But from the content of the mail, it might be written by Heron Express themselves

121280114.Text: Why did you make the cycranes sentient?

121280115.Text: It's because of your reluctance to contact them that they asked me to contact you

121280116.Text: ...That's cuz they wanted to visit, that or meet somewhere

121280117.Text: I haven't been out of my home for centuries

121280118.Text: You ask me why I make the cycranes sentient... maybe you focused on the wrong thing

121280119.Text: I have been a homebody for centuries and haven't talked face-to-face with anyone the entire time

121280120.Text: I thought it's too hard to talk to people, but I keep seeing these cycranes daily

121280121.Text: So I thought, maybe I can start talking to these cycranes, and move on to talking with people in the future

121280122.Text: So the sentience is not the point. The point is to have a conversation

121280123.Text: So, you are a recluse who suddenly wants to speak with someone, which is why you did it

121280124.Text: That's right. Having sentient cycranes with different personalities is all to mimic real-life conversations

121280125.Text: I can do my job online, receive my salary online, and there are parcel and food delivery services. I just have to take out the trash regularly, and I don't even need to meet anybody

121280126.Text: Honestly, not having to meet anybody makes me feel safe

121280127.Text: So, are you still unable to meet people face-to-face or go outside?

121280129.Text: I thought I could talk to cycranes, but I guess I overestimated myself. I'm too nervous

121280130.Text: Not meeting people for centuries. Unbelievable

121280131.Text: Reaaly? I didn't really realize it had been so long

121280132.Text: I didn't just do nothing for the past few centuries. I started trying to talk to cycranes

121280133.Text: ...I've had some really traumatic experiences in the past. It's just too much for me

121280134.Text: But it's not like I'm trying to swear off communication altogether. My texts are pretty normal, isn't it

121280136.Text: Sorry, this might not be funny

121280137.Text: Everyone has their own challenges to overcome. Even if you can't leave your home right now, you can still live the best you can

121280138.Text: Thank you, I will do my best

121280139.Text: I'm setting a goal. I will strive to "speak with cycranes"

121280140.Text: I may need some more time. Maybe I will finally be able to head out in a few centuries?

121280141.Text: Don't force yourself. It's good enough that you are messaging people

121280142.Text: Thank you. You really know how to comfort people

121280143.Text: I've been careful not to overdo it. Wanting to practice how to converse is something I've been working on

121280144.Text: And speaking with cycranes is my current goal

121280145.Text: I will apologize to Heron Express

121280146.Text: Also, I've sent you some gifts. I didn't know your address, so I sent them all to Ziqiao

Choices.Text: You still can't leave your house

121290101.Text: {NICKNAME}, I have a preliminary understanding of the Draught of Draconic Surge's pharmacology

121290102.Text: But... you're still busy with the troubles on the Xianzhou, right?

121290105.Text: Something happened at the Artisanship Commission

121290106.Text: No worries. Come find me when you're free

121290107.Text: I shall be waiting for you at the Synwood Pavilion

121290108.Text: The Ambrosial Arbor is growing everywhere. There was even a deer...

121300102.Text: There are some issues with which I should like your expertise, can you drop by the Synwood Pavilion for a spell?

121300106.Text: At your earliest convenience would be best

121310101.Text: Thank you, {NICKNAME}. Heron Express has re-established connection with the lost cycranes

121310102.Text: By the way, I asked my colleague, and there are still 5 cycranes missing

121310103.Text: If you see them, please help them out

121310201.Text: Thank you so much, {NICKNAME}. Just now, a colleague informed me that we have reconnected with another missing cycrane

121310202.Text: Now we only have 4 cycranes left to find. Please be on the lookout for them

121310203.Text: Am I the only one looking for them? Don't you look for them at all?

121310204.Text: Of course we are looking for them!

121310206.Text: Just leave it to me. I'll help you get those cycranes back

Choices.Text: Don't you look for them at all?

121310301.Text: You know what I'm going to say

121310302.Text: Thanks to you, we have reconnected with another missing cycrane. Now there are only 3 left

121310303.Text: Do you know what everyone in the company calls you now?

121310305.Text: I'll be waiting for more good news from you

121310401.Text: Good news! We have reconnected with another missing cycrane. Now there are only 2 left.

121310402.Text: Cycrane hunter! You are one step closer to finding all the missing cycranes

121310403.Text: Shouldn't you reflect on yourself? Are you really making an effort to find them?

121310406.Text: Just leave it to me. I'll help you get all of them back

121310408.Text: I'll be waiting for more good news from you

Choices.Text: Are you really making an effort to find them?
I will find all of them

121310501.Text: Another missing cycrane is back. Now there is only 1 left

121310602.Text: All of the missing cycranes are back!

121310603.Text: Another piece of good news. The engineers analyzed the routes of the missing cycranes and found some clues

121310604.Text: We also prepared some rewards for you. You know where I am. Come find me

121320101.Text: {NICKNAME}, I have prepared the present of which I have mentioned

121320102.Text: Come over to the Synwood Pavilion, I wish to entrust you with it in person

121320104.Text: Now is not a good time

121320105.Text: Do not worry, I will be there awaiting your presence

121330000.Text: Hello {NICKNAME}, my apologies for the disturbance. I have something else requiring your assistance

121330002.Text: Remember the time you defeated the Mara-struck at the plaza and heroically saved the Dragon Lady?

121330003.Text: That's true. It was nothing, really

121330004.Text: I can't quite remember. Is there a problem? Or... are you planning to reward citizens who do good deeds?

121330005.Text: No no no, don't worry. We haven't forgotten your good deeds

121330006.Text: As for the Dragon Lady, I have a request, so I'd like to meet up with you to talk about it

121330008.Text: Looks like you've done so many good deeds, you've forgotten about it

121330009.Text: But honestly, no one who has seen the Dragon Lady would forget her strange looks with her horns and a tail

121330010.Text: *sigh* it's difficult to explain this. It'd be easier to talk to you in person

121330011.Text: Could you please take some time to visit the Realm-Keeping Commission? I'll tell you the details in person

121340000.Text: How was it, did you get the record

121340001.Text: I asked Serval for her album, but she doesn't have it, so

121340002.Text: Yeah, yeah. Pom-Pom will ask the corporation if we can get it from them. But Pom-Pom cannot guarantee it'll satisfy the taste of all passengers

121340003.Text: Don't be upset, you're a Trailblazer, an opportunity will come to you eventually

121510101.Text:
Greetings, {NICKNAME}.
The Seat of Divine Foresight is currently collaborating with the Ten-Lords Commission's spiritfarers in pursuit of a heinous crime, and requires your assistance.
Might I inquire if you have recently received any parcels of mysterious origin?

121510103.Text: Oh-ho, this will be simple then.

121510105.Text: How odd. Is it possible that there are errors in the report submitted by Qingzu?

121510107.Text: How odd. Were you not made aware of this issue?

121510108.Text: To be frank, the parcel could be from the Annihilation Gang. Those violent followers of the Ruin Author were trying to upend the Xianzhou with it.

121510109.Text: If you do receive parcels of such description, please hand it over to Qingzu at the Seat of Divine Foresight. She shall forward the item to the experts in the Ten-Lords Commission to handle it.

121510110.Text: Of course, if you have any other means of destruction that would not cause any danger, please feel free to use them. Just remember to update Qingzu after it is done.

121510111.Text: At present, I have urgent matters to attend to. I won't be able to respond from now.

121520101.Text: [Emergency Alert from the Luofu Realm-Keeping Commission] According to the regulations of the Commission, physical fights and brawls are illegal and not only pose a threat to the well-being of others, but may also lead to serious consequences. We remind all residents and travelers to not believe unverified disinformation and to rationally resolve conflicts. When encountering traffic congestion or navigational restrictions, please plan your travel and return accordingly, follow the order of passage, and avoid blocking emergency lanes to prevent secondary accidents. It is everyone's responsibility to maintain a harmonious and stable environment in the Luofu.

121530103.Text: Please reply if you see this message

121530105.Text: Sorry. I just got around to answering this

121530106.Text: Almost forgot to report back to you. My apologies

121530107.Text: I found the sheep, but they were all eaten by the wolves. The wolves haven't had enough and wanted to eat me as well. I dealt with them already

121530108.Text: Then I was taken to see a group calling themselves The Unshackled, and they insisted I join them. What a bother

121530110.Text: Why? You're making me scared to join them...

121530111.Text: You know that the Alliance does not ban merchants who worship the Plagues Author from coming to the Xianzhou and trading here

121530112.Text: This open-minded policy is bringing quite a bit of trouble for the Realm-Keeping Commission as we try to maintain the peace here

121530113.Text: This group, The Unshackled, is one such trouble

121530114.Text: Sure, its members are law-abiding individuals and have not committed any crime

121530115.Text: However, these people believe in the Path of Abundance, and that they will accumulate "good karma" if they release living beings into the wild, thus earning good fortune for themselves

121530116.Text: They have started to release more and more creatures, even including some invasive species. It's quite a headache for the Commission

121530117.Text: That's why we'd like you to infiltrate The Unshackled and crumble them from within! The Realm-Keeping Commission will reward you lavishly

121530118.Text: Me again? Does the Realm-Keeping Commission not have any employees? I don't even know how to help you, even if I want to

121530119.Text: Crumble them from within? How? I don't even know how to help you, even if I want to

121530120.Text: Don't sell yourself short! All six Commissions are recounting your legendary exploits infiltrating the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus and taking them down by wit

121530121.Text: You're a professional when it comes to destabilizing such organizations

121530122.Text: Of course, we won't force you

121530123.Text: If you really can't dissolve them, you can always just give us intel on their future actions, so we can prevent them from doing anything outrageous

121530124.Text: Anyways, thank you in advance for this business. The Realm-Keeping Commission will reward you lavishly for sure!

121540101.Text: You there? I wanna ask something

121540102.Text: Serval, I wanna get some automatons...

121540104.Text: I get it, I get it. {F#Every dashing girl has a dream to drive mechas, right?}{M#Every boy has an undying love for mechas, right?}

121540105.Text: Before we continue this conversation, let me get 2 things straight:

121540106.Text: 1. Those things don't have a cockpit. You can't sit in it

121540107.Text: 2. They are weapons for Silvermane Guards. Not for sale

121540109.Text: I saw plenty of abandoned automatons back in Belobog. If we can fix them...

121540110.Text: I get that the Guards won't sell me a functioning automaton

121540111.Text: But if we can fix those junk scraps that the Guards don't want...

121540113.Text: We can't sell intact weapons, but won't be breaking the law if we pick a few broken models from the scrapyard and fix them up

121540114.Text: Well, I'm gonna send you a coordinate. Go there to find me as soon as you arrive at Belobog~

Choices.Text: What if I fix one instead...?

121550108.Text: That's him. We caught him, and he's right here at the docks

121590106.Text: I won't choose sides, so do your best

121600103.Text: Xiaohan has left the group "Aurum Alley Revival Project"

121600107.Text: An open-minded perspective is more valuable than any singular viewpoint

121610101.Text: Before the bidding begins, there's something the president wants to tell us

121610102.Text: Why does it feel like a BBEG situation?

121610103.Text: What a long trip it has been! It really makes you feel all sorts of emotions looking back on how far we've come.

121610106.Text: When this battle is over, I'm going back to my homeland to get married

121620104.Text: Go to Exalting Sanctum and you'll figure it out.

121630102.Text: My work on the Xianzhou draws to a close. Now, a traveler like me is about to start my next adventure

121630103.Text: It's been a fun few days

121640127.Text: Oh. {NICKNAME}, Sushang, can you come to the docks?

121750102.Text: I have something to tell you

121650001.Text: Did you manage to recover the Inspo Jade Abaci without a hitch?

121650004.Text: Stop bugging me or I'm done

121650007.Text: ...I actually don't have many friends, so I wanted to ask you about some relationship stuff, is that alright?

121650008.Text: I'm good at talking about matters of the heart. You can ask me anything

121650009.Text: I'm no good at things like that. Maybe you should look for someone else?

121650010.Text: Uh, girls usually like precious gifts with a little sentimental meaning, right?

121650011.Text: What makes Jingzhai so different? She asked me to throw away my gift

121650012.Text: What exactly did you give her?

121650013.Text: A padlock! To show our hearts are locked together!

121650014.Text: Maybe she just doesn't want your precious gift

121650015.Text: It's nothing much, just a padlock. Is it too outdated?

121650017.Text: *sigh* I get it, this thing is really a bit outdated. Also, the allegory of "locking up the heart of your intended" is out of touch with this generation's concept of love

121650018.Text: But at the very least, this padlock is still inlaid with gold and jade and should be worth quite a bit. Do girls really not like it?

121650019.Text: Where did you get it from, Cong...

121650020.Text: Your shopping tastes break my heart...

121650021.Text: I didn't buy it, it's... it's a treasure passed down from my past life! You don't even understand its value

121650022.Text: At my hatching rebirth, I held this thing in my hand. The elders all said it represented a "fate of jade and gold," so they sent me to the Artisanship Commission for further studies

121650023.Text: I thought it would be very appealing to girls. *sigh* I just didn't expect Jingzhai to be a girl who went against the norm and looked at jewelry like dirt

121650024.Text: No matter, I'll think of another gift to make her happy

Not my forte. Ask someone else
What exactly did you give her?
Where did you get that from, Cong...

121660002.Text: Someone saw the Poetic Genius ingenium I built in the Spare Time Book Shop, don't let it escape!

121660003.Text: It looks like a silly goldfish, you'll know when you see it

121660004.Text: Got it, I'm off to catch it

121660005.Text: You need to give me some overtime pay

121660007.Text: What kind of monsters have you made? Just asking them for a few lines of poetry is like a matter of life and death

121660008.Text: Okay, time is money. It's overtime pay you want, right? Fine you got it

121660009.Text: Come to think of it, this one's quite impressive, it went straight to the bookstore to collect data

121660010.Text: By the way, the person who reported this said when he saw it, it was swaying its head while commenting on "Drifting Clouds"!

121660011.Text: What a coincidence, I heard that Ms. Jingzhai's ex is Guyu, the author of "Drifting Clouds"

121660013.Text: That guy has a lot of influence in the literary world, if I can surpass his writings, I'll definitely win Jingzhai's heart

121660014.Text: To achieve the level of a great poet overnight is a monumental task...

121660015.Text: I won't belittle myself! With my ingenia's help, I'll definitely surpass him!

121660016.Text: What era are we living in now!? You and he are completely different. You have harnessed the power of technology to write poetry on an industrial scale, and will crush him easily

121660017.Text: Thanks for your vote of confidence, {NICKNAME}!

121660018.Text: By the way, when you get there, can you help me buy a copy of Drifting Clouds? I want to study it more

121660019.Text: I used to think the works written by my romantic rival were full of campy lovey-dovey nonsense, so I was annoyed and didn't want to read them

121660020.Text: But as the saying goes, know thy enemy, and thine enemies are few and far between... So, for Miss Jingzhai, I'm throwing caution to the wind!

121660021.Text: Logistics on Xianzhou is so convenient, why don't you place an order yourself?

121660022.Text: Oh, since you're already doing so many things for me, why don't you just go this extra mile while you're at it

121660023.Text: Fine, fine, I'm already used to running errands anyway

This might be a foolhardy dream...
I'm used to it by now

121670000.Text: You there? I have something I need your help with, {F#beautiful}{M#handsome}

121670001.Text: I'm around. Pray tell, what can I help with?

121670002.Text: Oh, don't say it so formally! You make it sound like we're strangers

121670003.Text: I would go to the end of the earth for you, Miss Xikui

121670005.Text: I can definitely help. Compensation is the key, though

121670006.Text: I like how straightforward you are

121670007.Text: Don't worry. You'll get paid for your work! I won't dare to give you less than what you deserve when Madam Yukong likes you so much

121670008.Text: Now, due to the unusual yinyang phenomena brought by the Ambrosial Arbor's revival, many of Heron Express' cycranes and freight starskiffs have had accidents and a great number of goods were lost

121670009.Text: They want to send their staff to retrieve these lost goods, but you know... it's not very safe out there right now

121670010.Text: The Sky-Faring Commission plans to send people who are skilled at controlling cycranes, trustworthy, and have had some military training to help them

121670011.Text: I'm not skilled at controlling cycranes...

121670012.Text: You're too humble. I realized you're different to everyone else from the moment you controlled the cycrane to save Madam Yukong's daughter

121670013.Text: We have only known each other for a few days, yet you already have so much trust in me. I feel flustered...

121670014.Text: You are the hero who saved Madam Yukong's daughter! Even if I were to lose my trust in the general, I would never lose my trust in you

121670015.Text: Since when did I get military training...

121670016.Text: You didn't receive any military training, and yet performed so well when you saved Madam Yukong's daughter. It just goes to show your outstanding talent and capacity

121670017.Text: Come on, stop saying no. You are THE ONE for this task

121670018.Text: Heron Express sent over a contact person. She's waiting for you at the doors of the Sky-Faring Commission

121670019.Text: Come over quickly. Don't let them wait too long

121680002.Text: My investigation and research on the Xianzhou is complete.

121680003.Text: No... Rather, I have a completely new topic now.

121680004.Text: Thank you for your companionship along the way. You are the most sincere and reliable friend I have made on Xianzhou.

121680005.Text: So, no matter what happens, I don't want to hide anything from you or deceive you.

121680006.Text: I want to share my happiness with you. See you at the usual place.

121690002.Text: Would you happen to have the time to meet up?

121690004.Text: Or you wouldn't still be chatting with me now

121690005.Text: Haha, sounds like you already reported what I did to the Xianzhou people.

121690006.Text: You stood by your convictions, as expected. I don't blame you

121690007.Text: I think we've already said all there is to be said

121690009.Text: That's not what I wanted to discuss, {NICKNAME}

121690010.Text: Come. Come to the shores of Scalegorge Waterscape. I'm not going to talk about immortality, or silly things such as fame and wealth.

121690011.Text: How about helping out with an old friend's last fickle request? Or think about it as giving a terminal patient his final care?

121700010.Text: That's not what I wanted to discuss, {NICKNAME}

121700011.Text: Come meet me at the usual place. I'm not going to talk about immortality, or silly things such as fame and wealth.

122040001.Text: But I never thought I'd ever see my sister again after all these years.

122040002.Text: Umm, so what's the full story between you two? Care to tell me more about it?

122040003.Text: Wait, hold on. What's happening here? Can you give me some context first?

122040006.Text: My parents were Cloud Knights, but they passed away when we were young.

122040007.Text: Since I had to support both of us, I had to work all day and didn't have much time to discipline my sister.

122040008.Text: As a result, she ended up becoming a troublemaker and didn't even finish school.

122040009.Text: So, I secretly applied for her to join the Cloud Knights, hoping that being in the forces would straighten her out... and maybe she'd become a better person.

122040010.Text: When she found out what I did, we had a huge argument. She thought I was meddling in her life.

122040011.Text: I thought she'd refuse to serve and spill the beans to the Military Affairs Office, but... she actually joined the Cloud Knights.

122040012.Text: After that, we started to drift apart and eventually, one day, she disappeared without a trace.

122040013.Text: You did what you thought was best for her. She'll understand it when she grows up. Don't blame yourself over it.

122040014.Text: It's good for unruly youngsters to go through some tough experiences to shape them up.

122040015.Text: I always thought she didn't want to see me because she resented me for enlisting her in the Cloud Knights.

122040016.Text: But when I saw her today, she told me she got transferred to the Ten-Lords Commission and didn't have the chance to contact me and explain everything.

122040017.Text: Now that I see she's doing well, I can finally breathe a sigh of relief. As long as she doesn't regret it, I'm okay with it.

122040018.Text: Anyway, it was a misunderstanding from the start. Sorry for dragging you into my family drama.

122080003.Text: Every time I see the Lightning-Lord appear, I feel it's super cool
