122080011.Text: Let's get back to the topic. Well, congrats to Huohuo for getting Tail back!

122080012.Text: Yeah, who would've thought that Tail was with Hanya?

122080013.Text: I heard it took Tail a long time to recover. Must have been tough.

122080014.Text: Hold on, something just crossed my mind.

122080015.Text: Are you planning to take a photo of Tail?

122080018.Text: Don't push yourself, Huohuo. Feel free to speak up if you disagree.

122080020.Text: Why don't you ask Tail first? What does he say?

122080021.Text: Oh, Mr. Tail says he's not interested.

122080022.Text: Well, if Mr. Tail isn't interested, that's fine. We have plenty of other topics to discuss.

122080023.Text: First things first, let's check our account now.

Choices.Text: What does Tail say about this?

122090001.Text: Passenger {NICKNAME}, ever since the start of this journey, there have been a lot of new visitors boarding the Express

122090003.Text: These must be the rewards of the journey!

122090004.Text: Yeah. You have to treasure these encounters!

122090005.Text: To savor these precious memories, the Express has left a guest book for all our new friends. They can write comments in it.

122090006.Text: The guest book is on the bar counter. Go take a look when you have time

122100004.Text: "The missing researchers are all opinion leaders on the space station's Dark Web..."

122100005.Text: Holy moly, you know stuff that even the Security Department isn't aware of.

122100006.Text: Ahem, I just got the file from next door.

122100007.Text: It sounds far-fetched, but on the off chance that it's true...

122100009.Text: They staged the whole missing thing to get rid of dissenters.

122100010.Text: Tsk, tsk, that's such a brilliant plot. Justice may come late, but it will be served. The management must step down!

122100012.Text: If that's really the case, doesn't it mean this chat group is in grave danger?

122110000.Text: I've heard about what you did. Nice work.

122110004.Text: What's there to worry about when I'm around?

122110007.Text: It's a shame that we haven't found the Phase Flame yet.

122110009.Text: I'll think of it as Ruan Mei owing me a favor.

122110012.Text: Also, I'm thankful to Mr. Ratio.

Choices.Text: It's a shame that we haven't found the Phase Flame yet.
Also, I'm thankful to Mr. Ratio.

122120001.Text: {NICKNAME}, I need your help with something

122120005.Text: Madam Ruan Mei created some interesting little critters on the space station, I accommodated them temporarily in the Seclusion Zone

122120006.Text: And now, I would like you to nurture these little ones

122120007.Text: Why me? Wouldn't it be better if you do it yourself?

122120008.Text: Among the people I know, you showed as the best match. Also... these things Madam Ruan Mei left behind are kind of related to you

122120009.Text: But there are so many idling researchers on the space station, why am I even chosen...

122120011.Text: Heh, they won't be soon enough

122120012.Text: With Mr Screwllum's help, I upgraded the robot programs. The helper robot will assist you the entire way. Of course, I'll keep an eye on you

122130001.Text: Nope, isn't he at the master control zone?

122130002.Text: He's there when he has time to kill, but he's on a mission

122130003.Text: Why would you ask me? I tried calling him over, he wouldn't even lift a paw. Why would he look for me

122130004.Text: Peppy's a big boy now, he has his own ideas

122130005.Text: A Curio was stolen recently, so I asked him to enlist your help...

122130006.Text: I kept seeing him in the storage room, so I thought you met up

122130007.Text: A Curio was stolen? You should allocate more money to upgrade the security system, lead researcher!

122130008.Text: Any problem you can solve with money isn't a problem. This is a special case

122130009.Text: Why would you send Peppy for me? If something's lost, shouldn't you ask the Security Department?

122130010.Text: The lost Curio is the Joy Filtration Set, a cube used to store happiness. It's very popular among the researchers, judging by the consistently high application rate

122130011.Text: I'd like to start investigating from the researchers, but lately... Madam Ruan Mei has been visiting the station

122130012.Text: I'm worried this might not be a good look

122130013.Text: Peppy has a sharp sense of smell and does not attract attention wandering about, so I think he is the best for this investigation

122130014.Text: I've placed other zones under lockdown when everyone's focused on Madam Ruan Mei's visit

122130015.Text: However, Peppy has gone radio silent. I'm concerned that it has run into danger. {NICKNAME}, can you go take a look?

122130016.Text: Leave it to me, this is nothing

122130017.Text: Great! I'll share its coordinates with you right away

122130018.Text: Wait a sec, this all seems eerily familiar...

122130020.Text: Oh, right, I installed a specially made device on Peppy. When you find him, remember to activate the beacon. There's a surprise for you

Choices.Text: Why would he look for me?
Why would you send Peppy for me?
Why do I feel dj vu?

122140002.Text: Whoa! What's that? It's soooo cute

122140003.Text: Why does it look a bit like me

122140004.Text: Did you dress it this way?

122140005.Text: Of course not! Why would you think that

122140006.Text: This little one is a lifeform created by Miss Ruan Mei. It's naturally adorable

122140008.Text: Why don't you bring it back around the Express for a spell? I want to get a few pics of me holding it!

122150004.Text: Its eyes are totally like yours!

122150006.Text: Its vibe is totally like yours!

122150008.Text: I have never seen a lifeform like this before. If you have data about them, remember to enter them into the data bank once you get back to the Express.

Choices.Text: Its eyes are totally like yours!
Its vibe is totally like yours!

122160000.Text: These are Madam Ruan Mei's creations... Found one that looks like you

122160002.Text: [Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later.

122160005.Text: Even its personality is like yours!

122160007.Text: [Automatic reply] Hi, I'm currently unavailable, and I won't be contacting you later.

Choices.Text: Even its personality is like yours!

122170000.Text: This creation looks very much like you... it's like a miracle

122170002.Text: I didn't think they would surprise me like this. When I was nurturing them, I didn't expect something like this would happen

122170003.Text: Are you... taking care of them? How is everything these days?

122170004.Text: Are you asking how I've been recently? Not bad

122170006.Text: Are you asking how they've been recently? Not bad

122170007.Text: They're hanging out pretty nicely on the space station. They don't really have any worries besides missing you

122170009.Text: When you have time, can you take a full "family photo" of them for me?

122170010.Text: I'm curious what will become of these little lifeforms with their genes passing down through generations

122170011.Text: But... they all really want to see you. Are you sure you don't want to come back and visit them?

122170013.Text: I'm about to go on a faraway journey. Beyond the service area of a beacon. You can leave me messages, and I will give them a closer look when I return

Choices.Text: You're not coming back to visit them?

122180003.Text: I don't think so. Look at its paws. I don't think it can hold tiles

122180005.Text: Has Celestial Jade ever been popular on the space station? I think they probably don't know how to play. I'm not really sure about the specifics.

122180006.Text: A pity. A life without Celestial Jade is a life lived incomplete

122180007.Text: *sigh* With so many people, it would be easy to set up matches. A shame

122180008.Text: Remember to ask if it has any interest in Celestial Jade

122180009.Text: If the answer is yes, then come to the Luofu and we can be game-buddies

Choices.Text: Probably not. Look at its hands...

122190009.Text: Silver Wolf, isn't it? Give the phone back to Blade

122190013.Text: Alright. He didn't say anything. But I can tell

122190014.Text: He definitely likes it a lot

122200000.Text: I encountered a cute creature that looks just like Clara!

122200003.Text: Is it a cat? It's soooo cute. I want to pet her little head

122200004.Text: {F#Big sister}{M#Big brother}, if you get the chance, can you bring it over to where I am

122200005.Text: Okay. If I can... I'll definitely do it next time!

122200006.Text: Of course! But it's not a pet. It has its own will, so we'll need to check with how it feels

122200008.Text: Belobog is quite cold, so if it can come over, you should give it a few more layers of clothing, {F#big sister}{M#big brother} (*`*)

Choices.Text: I'll need to ask its opinion.

122210000.Text: Holy! I encountered a little lifeform that looks just like you

122210003.Text: Where did you get such a cute little thing

122210004.Text: Why don't you bring it over to the Luofu, and let me and Sushang have a look

122210005.Text: Oh, cutey pie, you look sooo adorable! Let me rub my face against you!

122210007.Text: Relax. This thing isn't a cat. It might even be dangerous

122210008.Text: Forget it. It has its own desires. It doesn't want to go anywhere, and just wants to stay at the space station

122210009.Text: If I get a chance, I think I can go to it instead. Hmm. Yeah, that should be a work trip for my stream

122220000.Text: I heard the helper robot reporting about some recent happenings. If you are going to take group photos, it's best to bring in the person who is directly involved

122220001.Text: Hm. Ruan Mei got back just in time, too.

122220002.Text: Asta has invited {NICKNAME} into group chat

122220004.Text: I just got back from a desolate region to a place with signal

122220005.Text: Great. I was looking for you, Madam Ruan Mei

122220006.Text: Well, well, look who we have here! I was just thinking about having a chat with Madam Ruan Mei, and lo and behold, I caught up with her!

122220008.Text: The size of the photo you sent is too large. Please compress the file and then try again.

122220009.Text: Send it as an attachment. It will be clearer that way

122220010.Text: Attachment "We miss you on the space station" has been sent

122220014.Text: I've heard that organic lifeforms are capable of expressing affection in a variety of ways. These creations have exhibited infinite possibilities... Marvelous.

122220015.Text: ...I didn't expect them to develop to such an extent. It's almost like a miniature civilization

122220016.Text: They are still in their infancy. Calculated per the metrics of organic creatures' lifespans, their society is but in its cradle

122220017.Text: Is there anything you want to say to them?

122220018.Text: So you want to come back and visit them?

122220020.Text: It's enchanting... This might just be my most beautiful "accident."

122220021.Text: Maybe I will visit the space station soon again

122220023.Text: The creations are currently being taken care of by {NICKNAME} and the helper robot. If you need anything, please contact me at any time

Choices.Text: I was just looking for you.
Anything you wanna say to them?
Wanna come back and visit them?

122230002.Text: Lead Research Asta was attacked too.

122230005.Text: Psyops on the masses have always been the most terrifying kind of attack

122230006.Text: Indeed. It seems that the Annihilation Gang isn't just about mindless violence, as the rumors suggest.

122230007.Text: If the Lead Researcher wasn't rescued at the end, we'd all be in deep, deep trouble

122230008.Text: Not necessarily. Maybe she's the one who orchestrated it all

122230009.Text: Masterminding this elaborate ruse by deliberately harming herself to earn some sympathy points

122230010.Text: That line of thought does have some merit...

122230012.Text: Is that really worth it? All that hassle just to palliate a few keyboard warriors?

122230014.Text: Speaking of which, where's that very first rabble-rouser, Rich_Knowit

122230015.Text: Oh, right. He was real righteous sounding when he invited me into the group

122230017.Text: Ugh, the guy left the group without making any noise...

122240000.Text: Peppy found the "Joy Filtration Set." I know you're definitely to thank for this, {NICKNAME}

122240001.Text: Peppy alone definitely couldn't do it

122240002.Text: He was talking you up ever since he got back

122240003.Text: I wonder what pitch of woof Peppy makes when he is buttering me up

122240004.Text: Next time, you can ask him in person

122240005.Text: Ah, it's nothing. No need to be so polite with me. I just wanted to help you

122240008.Text: Alright. Enough about Peppy for now. I actually wanted to talk with you about something else today

122240009.Text: You should go back and talk with the robot helper. It discovered something pretty wondrous near its location

122240012.Text: You'll see as soon as you get over there. To keep the surprise, I won't spoil anything

Choices.Text: What pitch of woof is he using?

122240100.Text: Thanks for the help with the research, {NICKNAME}

122240101.Text: Speaking of which, did you see the creation that looks like Madam Herta? Isn't it interesting? What did it say to you?

122240102.Text: Oh, you're talking about Wisteria Cake. Yeah, she looks a bit like Herta. Even her personality is a bit similar

122240103.Text: And she likes science. That day, she brought a few sidekicks with her and told me she wanted to finish a gene sequencing project, requesting that I nurture more creations for her to use for an in-depth research

122240105.Text: Though I'm not sure I understand why Madam Ruan Mei's creation will be so similar to Madam Herta

122240106.Text: I'm more curious about the "sidekicks" she had with her. Do those also look like other people

122240107.Text: Yes, but not as close as you think... It's like running into someone wearing a matching shirt on the street. There are some similarities, but it isn't entirely the same

122240108.Text: Exactly! I think it's almost a splitting image, right? I dub it the Micro-Herta and there is also a Mini-Mei!

122240109.Text: The two little critters are pretty special. Their situation... the helper bot sent me the report

122240110.Text: Right, the bot said it wants to see you. It sounds like the little one that looks like Herta has some problems

122240111.Text: I'm not sure what they're trying to get up to... I have too much on my plate, so I can't leave. Besides, they asked for you specifically. Anyway, {NICKNAME}, head over when you have the time

122240112.Text: That's a very Herta way of doing things...

Choices.Text: Yes, they look exactly the same.
That's a very Herta way of doing things...

122250001.Text: How did you know I was going to send you photos

122250003.Text: Can you send it over to Kafka for me?

122250004.Text: Wait, how did you know I was going to send you photos

122250009.Text: I'm not sure what this thing is, but it looks like you put a lot of energy into it

122250011.Text: Thank you, {NICKNAME}, I really like it.

122250012.Text: Silver Wolf and I are out on a job. Catch you later

122260000.Text: Creation Nurturing Administrative Backend  Reminder: It is 00:01 "Herta" system time. Yesterday's meals have been administered. Currently generating a Daily Report of Creations' Activities and Risks in the Feeding Area for you.

122260001.Text: Daily Report of Creations' Activities and Risks in the Feeding Area: 1. Some creations tried to steal from the bowls of other creations, only to have the latter swallow the rest of the food in one second, shocking all creations present to their core. 2. A creation knocked over their bowl and the food spilled everywhere. It then seemed to realize its mistake and ate all the scattered food, licking the floor until one could see their face in it. This caused a passing-by creation to accidentally trip over. 3. A new creation tried leftover feed from the previous day for the first time. After a brief confusion, it successfully ingested the food. 4. A creation thumped the floor with their tail as they picked their food, all due to the food not being up to their tastes. Later, due to the hardness of the space station's floor, their tailbone fractured. The appendage has been bandaged and is not in a serious condition. 5. A creation invented a new pose and stretched its body as it fed on food, attracting the curious gazes of other creations.

122270000.Text: Creation Nurturing Administrative Backend  Reminder: It is 00:01 "Herta" system time. Yesterday's management of the rest area has ended. Currently generating a Daily Report of Settled Creations' Activities for you.

122270001.Text: Daily Report of Settled Creations' Activities and Risks: 1. One creation attempted a big, leisurely stretch while bathing in the starlight, then got injured due to excessive stretching. 2. One creation jumped onto the floor and conversed with its own reflection on the polished floor for 5 minutes. The other creations are very concerned about its mental health. 3. Two creations fell asleep while snuggling against each other. However, one of them experienced a leg cramp and kicked the other dozens of times. Both woke up from the dream and engaged in a heated argument. 4. A passing robot was updating its system today and made strange noises, waking up three creations in the process. 5. Three creations are curled up in the same nest and seeking warmth from each other. The air condition temperature for this area has been reduced.

122280000.Text: {NICKNAME}! I saw the Sky-Faring Commission's notice that the Express has docked on the Xianzhou

122280001.Text: Are you guys on the Luofu already?

122280002.Text: Yup, fresh off the train. We're now at Starskiff Haven

122280003.Text: I see you're quick with the news!

122280004.Text: Heh, the general sent me to welcome you all at Starskiff Haven. See you in a bit!

122290000.Text: {NICKNAME}, do you remember why we came to the Luofu this time?

122290001.Text: Of course I do! To witness you becoming the Express' greatest sword master!

122290002.Text: That was important, too! But that was not our original reason, was it?

122290003.Text: We came to take part in the Wardance, didn't we?

122290004.Text: That's right! If I hadn't asked, you'd have forgotten!

122290005.Text: We originally came as VIP guests to take part in the Wardance! Then, as expected, we ran into accidents!

122290006.Text: We successfully captured Hoolay on the Skysplitter and General Jing Yuan decided to formally hold the Wardance for real

122290007.Text: I have two Masters that got me nice benefits, so I've managed to get two staff passes for you and Dan Heng. You can come straight to the Skysplitter backstage without any trouble!

122290008.Text: I'm amazing, right? Where is my praise?

122290009.Text: Thank you, Super-March! I knew I could count on you!

122290010.Text: You're the best! Dan Heng was so frosty. All he said was something about: "One should maintain a proper distance from contestants when spectating sports..." Such a buzz kill~

122290011.Text: What's so good about going backstage? I feel like spectators should keep their distance from competitors

122290012.Text: That's weird. That's pretty much what Dan Heng said... But you'll be able to see all kinds of things backstage that you won't see anywhere else! You know the Xianzhou saying: "A minute on stage is ten years of hard work offstage!"

122290013.Text: Forget it. I don't care if you two come or not! Humph!

122290014.Text: I'm going back to training. Chat later!

122300001.Text: Can you take Luka to the Divination Commission?

122300002.Text: I don't think he knows the way

122300003.Text: Why are you messaging me instead of Luka?

122300004.Text: I'm worried he's competing at the moment

122300005.Text: I don't want to interrupt him

122300008.Text: Okay, no problem. But why does he need to go to the Divination Commission?

122300011.Text: The Divination Commission said that the jade pendant we brought them...

122300012.Text: Is actually a jade abacus. You should know what that is

122300014.Text: I think Luka would definitely be interested

122300015.Text: I'll wait for you at the Divination Commission

122310001.Text: I was busy, but suddenly I'm not

122310002.Text: I always have time for you

122310004.Text: I saw on the news that you're the coach for the Belobog team

122310005.Text: I was sure you'd be busy

122310008.Text: Mr. Tail wants to ask why do you suddenly have time on your hands?

122310009.Text: Luka was just eliminated. I have time on my hands all of a sudden

122310014.Text: It's okay. You win some, you lose some.

122310015.Text: I thought the sports news would have already reported it. Did you not see it?

122310017.Text: But I just saw it on a newsstand

122310019.Text: Mr. Tail is making a fuss about wanting to see you

122310020.Text: Well, Mr. Tail said that he wasn't making a fuss

Choices.Text: I always have time for you
You win some, you lose some.

122320000.Text: Qingque has restored another batch of documents

122320002.Text: He should be the first to see them

122330001.Text: I have something important to announce

122330002.Text: We're going to be getting wages after this? Awesome!

122330003.Text: Sadly, no. That's not been planned yet

122330004.Text: The budget for the Nameless' expenditures will still be managed solely by the navigator for the time being. If there is a need among individual passengers, however, you can come to apply for an additional allowance from me

122330005.Text: Speaking of which, why doesn't Mr. Yang ever seem to worry about money...

122330008.Text: The food options on the dining menu are about to be updated? The day has finally come!

122330009.Text: Does Passenger {NICKNAME} have some points of dissatisfaction to raise about the current menu?

122330010.Text: I guess {F#she}{M#he} is probably about to complain about the pre-made meals again!

122330011.Text: Then, let me give a piece of personal advice: Stop scrolling through food blogger videos

122330012.Text: Alright, I'll spill. It is I who borrowed away Dan Heng's neck massager

122330014.Text: By the way, "borrowing" is when you let someone know. If you don't, that's called "stealing."

122330015.Text: It's just a massager. If {NICKNAME} wants one, we can order one

122330016.Text: I checked the price as well. Let's leave the bill with {NICKNAME}

122330017.Text: Ahem. To business. The thing I wanted to tell everyone is that the Astral Express will soon be one of the shareholders of the Penacony Conglomerate

122330018.Text: The Family and the IPC will begin formal negotiations soon regarding the Dreamscape's reconstruction plans and commercial projects for the future

122330019.Text: After this round of investments, the IPC will hold 30% of Penacony's shares

122330020.Text: And the Strategic Investment Department managed to secure a significant boon for us: When the financing is done, the IPC will transfer 5% of the stocks to the Astral Express to express their sincerity in developing a long-term partnership with the Nameless

122330022.Text: Though I don't know much about shares or options... It sounds pretty great!

122330023.Text: I'm more curious about how future dividends will be calculated?

122330024.Text: So, does that mean we're gonna get financial independence and early retirement soon?

122330025.Text: Oh, my. Have you been living in poverty this entire time, {NICKNAME}? You must have had it rough

122330027.Text: Clearly, your financial acumen is about on par with March 7th's.

122330029.Text: As the ceaselessly trailblazing Nameless, we got another responsibility to shoulder regarding this agreement

122330030.Text: As shareholders of the Penacony Conglomerate, we must bear the duty of being brand ambassadors and ensure the Planet of Festivities will no longer depart from the proper path of Harmony

122330031.Text: It's time to make everyone submit

122330033.Text: It's time for everyone to remember our name!

122330034.Text: Oh, it seems like {NICKNAME} is full of energy!

122330038.Text: I can tell {F#her}{M#his} determination from the words {F#she}{M#he} typed. We can't stop {F#her}{M#him}.

122330039.Text: It's time to make everyone submit

Choices.Text: Time to wield my shareholder power!

122340000.Text: I hope this is the right number.

122340002.Text: Yes, that's me. Did you need something?

122340003.Text: Uh, it's the right number. I'm {NICKNAME}. Who am I speaking to?

122340004.Text: Hello. This is your delivery person. You have a package that's been delivered to {TEXTJOIN#87} logistics hub

122340006.Text: That's strange. I haven't ordered anything online recently.

122340008.Text: The package is sealed. To protect your privacy, I'm not able to check the contents

122340009.Text: You should open it up yourself

122340010.Text: Who could be sending me a gift?

122340011.Text: What is the name of the sender?

122340012.Text: Hold on, let me have a look

122340013.Text: It says the sender is a "Mr. Aventurine"

122340014.Text: The first mate volunteered to take it to the Captain's Quarters for you

122340015.Text: Thanks for coming over, please sign for your delivery

122340016.Text: Before you sign, please check that the package is not damaged. If anything is missing, or if there are problems with product quality, please contact me at any time. If there are no other issues, please give me a five-star rating. Thank you very much!

122350000.Text: I just received a gift. It got sent to {TEXTJOIN#87}

122350001.Text: Aventurine sent it. This was inside

122350003.Text: Oh, it's a model. That brand is renowned for making quality products. If I'm not mistaken, this is a limited edition.

122350005.Text: {NICKNAME}, open the windows! Are there figures of us inside?

122350006.Text: This is a miniature of the Express. Looking at the exterior, I don't think it's designed to be opened.

122350007.Text: I used to collect models back home. Based on my experience, if there are additional accessories, they are usually displayed separately.

122350008.Text: Wow! Where did you get that? It's so pretty! I want one too. Shouldn't there be one for the conductor?

122350009.Text: You'll have to ask @{NICKNAME} about that

122350010.Text: Doesn't seem like it. There are only some other snacks and beverages in the package

122350011.Text: Maybe your packages are still on the way... I only received this one

122350012.Text: I don't have a package tracking number...

122350013.Text: I didn't receive anything either. Looks like {NICKNAME} is the only one who got it.

122350014.Text: I'll take the snacks if you don't want them!

122350015.Text: We shouldn't give the conductor too much junk food. We'll be in trouble if they get the runs.

122350017.Text: Jokes aside, this looks like it's specially prepared for {NICKNAME}

122350018.Text: When we did the handover for {TEXTJOIN#87} with The Family, we came to a consensus that the ownership of the ship should belong to the Express passenger who contributed the most to Penacony

122350019.Text: In other words, {TEXTJOIN#87} only has one owner right now, and that is {NICKNAME}. This gift is just for you

122350020.Text: Ah? Then I'll gladly accept it!

122350021.Text: Take it. It's what you deserve.

122350023.Text: Hang on, I'm going to get a lottery ticket now. We'll share the winnings among us

122350024.Text: Even if we win the grand prize, you're more than deserving of it!

122350025.Text: I think... it'll be more suitable if we give this to Pom-Pom.

122350026.Text: Pom-Pom is the conductor after all, and the conductor should be in charge of the Express.

122350028.Text: Pom-Pom doesn't want it! It's yours. Pom-Pom is just happy to be with all you passengers.

Choices.Text: Thanks! Don't mind if I do!
We should give it to Pom-Pom instead.

122360004.Text: It's bad. The situation is bad!

122360005.Text: You've lost everything in such a short amount of time?

122360006.Text: Not really... But my current situation is worse!

122360008.Text: I should have been more careful

122360009.Text: Anyway, {NICKNAME}, come save me! I don't have any other friends here apart from you, my bestie.

122360011.Text: I'm at... Where's this place again?

122360012.Text: Oh, I heard them saying that this is the hotel in the Dreamscape.

122360013.Text: Hurry! Otherwise I might really be a goner.

122370003.Text: It looks like they're going to force me to be part of some strange ritual

122370006.Text: Qingque? What's going on? Who are "they"?

122380005.Text: I need something from the both of you urgently

122380007.Text: But you might have to wait a little. Someone just stole his hat

122380008.Text: Can he handle it? I'm in a rush

122380011.Text: I can see him returning with his hat

122380012.Text: Fudge me! This street is such a mess

122380013.Text: You're telling me. Some people really don't know the concept of "order"

122380015.Text: I might have found the "organization" that you mentioned

122380017.Text: It's a long story. Hurry over to the hotel in the Dreamscape

122380018.Text: My friend is being threatened by them. It doesn't look good

122380019.Text: The hotel in the Dreamscape? I got it. We're on our way

122380020.Text: A friend of yours is one of ours too

122380021.Text: I will come along to help settle the problem, my friend

122390003.Text: Not lobby manager Dennis but partygoer Dancy! Keep the difference in mind, my friend!

122390004.Text: So, {F#Ms.}{M#Mr.} {NICKNAME}, how's everything at work going?

122390005.Text: I'm done with it. Being a lobby manager is harder than I thought

122390006.Text: Can you take over my shift? I'm clocking out

122390010.Text: Just you wait! I'm coming for you!

122390011.Text: I'm done with it. Being a lobby manager is harder than I thought

122400001.Text: Hey fam... I won a prize!

122400002.Text: Actually, it's a souvenir I got from a game I played. It's some kind of television!

122400003.Text: Who wants to see it? I'll carry it into the Parlor Car right now!

122400007.Text: Congratulations to {NICKNAME} for winning a television

122400008.Text: Looks like you've reaped quite a few rewards from Penacony

122400010.Text: Wait. Why haven't I experienced anything like this? I was at Penacony too! You're just too lucky, {NICKNAME}

122400011.Text: Do you want to place it in the Parlor Car? Once you do, let me know. I wanna touch it. See if I smooch some luck off you

122400013.Text: Wait! Hold on! You can't put this in the Parlor Car!

122400016.Text: Why not? Won't it be good for everyone to watch some TV on the couch?

122400017.Text: Hmm. TV and coffee. That just might bring out the taste of home

122400018.Text: The Parlor Car is a place to enjoy the stellar view. Pom-Pom has strict rules and regulations for every section of the Express. If we put the TV there, then it'll be the entertainment car, and that clashes with the enjoyment of scenery.

122400019.Text: That's right. If we do this, the Parlor Car will have the Phonograph and a TV. It'll start disturbing everyone else

122400020.Text: Alright... If even the Passengers don't think this is a good idea, {NICKNAME} just won't leave it there! That should do it, right?

122400022.Text: Pom-Pom's speech pattern is not that exaggerated. Anyway, this isn't what's important

122400024.Text: Alright, Pom-Pom... You're so strict. I won't put it there

122400029.Text: You can put it straight in the Passenger Cabin, {NICKNAME}

122400030.Text: It's where the long corridor leads to that armchair. You can place it on the cabinet nearby so everyone can watch it

122400031.Text: I see... You planned this out already, Pom-Pom. No wonder you're the conductor

122400033.Text: If we get the chance, we can have a movie night with the television every now and then

122400034.Text: You can watch some of the animations I've made in my homeworld. Some of the content is better viewed on a screen

122400035.Text: Mr. Yang... Please don't fall asleep again...

122400038.Text: Hm. I'm curious about the television, too. Penacony's devices have some special properties. I don't know if they can still persist beyond memoria-infused environments.

122410000.Text: Greetings, esteemed {F#Miss}{M#Mr.} {NICKNAME}. I've heard that you've assisted Randolph with data collection. On behalf of myself, I would like to express my most sincere gratitude.

122410001.Text: I believe Randolph has rewarded you accordingly, but this is also a part of my gratitude and sincerity. I hope you'll be satisfied.

122410002.Text: Thanks to your work, I've already submitted the proposal to The Family for review and recorded your name in the assistant's column.

122410003.Text: Finally, please allow me to express my deepest gratitude for your assistance with the store!

122420001.Text: I'm here because of that special challenge. A foxian contestant named Samatha wishes to fight you

122420003.Text: But this opponent doesn't look like a fighter

122420004.Text: Compared to the likes of Seele or Mr. Gepard, the feeling she gives me...

122420006.Text: You'll get your butt booted if you underestimate your opponent

122420007.Text: Indeed, there are hidden masters everywhere on the Xianzhou. You can't judge a book by its cover

122420008.Text: I shall look forward to it

122430000.Text: You secretly joined the Wardance? Why didn't you tell me?

122430005.Text: I'd never wear something so... rotund.

122430006.Text: Hang on. Silver Wolf has been on the Luofu these few days. Could she be pulling a prank?

122430007.Text: I'll call her and ask. Hold on

122430008.Text: She physically rolled on the floor laughing after hearing this

122430010.Text: She's still laughing so hard... she's about to choke

122430012.Text: She stopped and said it wasn't her

122430013.Text: It appears someone is using my identity to participate in the Wardance

122430014.Text: I thought it was your new gear or something. So it's someone impersonating you!

122430015.Text: Why would I ever wear such... "new gear"!

122430016.Text: That's what I thought! I knew it was some weirdo pretending to be you!

122430017.Text: And doing a poor job of it!

122430019.Text: Don't worry. Luka will help you teach them a lesson

122430020.Text: But the culprit didn't do anything overboard. Don't hurt them too bad

Choices.Text: I knew it! It was a fake!
Luka will teach them a lesson

122440000.Text: Contestant Luka, coach {NICKNAME}, greetings to you both. I am a representative of the organizing committee for this year's Luminary Wardance. May I ask if you have some time right now?

122440002.Text: Contestant Luka, we have an "invitational match" challenge for you from another contestant

122440003.Text: The contestant's name is Shuojin. We will send you his info shortly

122440006.Text: We should at least ask what this "invitational match" actually means

122440007.Text: Taking part in the formal tournament has already exhausted us. We don't have the energy for any "invitational match"

122440008.Text: Wait, don't just turn it down straight away!

122440009.Text: We should at least ask what this "invitational match" actually means

122440010.Text: That's a phrase I haven't heard before

122440012.Text: Yeah, I wanted to ask that, too

122440013.Text: You may be unfamiliar with our competition formats, so please allow me to explain. This year's Luminary Wardance features not only the traditional knockout and faceoff matches, but also special bouts known as "invitational matches"

122440014.Text: Put simply, during the process of the Wardance, contestants have the right to send challenge invites to other contestants for a one-on-one duel

122440015.Text: Now this is an opportunity to get my name out there and get my ranking up!

122440016.Text: Of course, there are also great risks involved in failure. Challengers who are unsuccessful will be immediately disqualified from future events. It is common for contestants to refuse such challenges

122440017.Text: If someone challenges me, does that mean I can challenge other people, too?

122440018.Text: Unfortunately, this is a supportive privilege offered only to lower-rank contestants to provide them with more opportunities to compete. On the other hand, being challenged is a recognition of your strength, contestant Luka

122440020.Text: I don't know if that's fair or unfair...

122440021.Text: Alright, I'll take a look at the files

122440022.Text: Furthermore, I have been asked by Miss Topaz of the IPC to extend an invitation to collaborate with you

122440023.Text: An invitation from Topaz? Collaborate with the IPC?

122440024.Text: Do you want to say no? Or shall we ask what this is about?

122440025.Text: I... My instincts are telling me not to deal with people from the IPC

122440026.Text: It seems that your fame is on the rise... I imagine the IPC wants you to endorse one of their products

122440027.Text: I... My instincts are telling me not to deal with people from the IPC

122440028.Text: The IPC is a tricky bunch. I feel like it would be best not to get involved with them

122440031.Text: Miss Topaz indicates that she would like to meet with you both in Aurum Alley, whether you are willing to work with her or not

122440032.Text: That is all the information I have for you. Good luck with your competition!

Choices.Text: Shall we ask what this is about?
Are you going to turn down free money?
The IPC is tricky... Maybe not?

122450000.Text: {NICKNAME}! You and Luka need to watch out!

122450002.Text: I saw some news on the net and I had to tell you about it

122450003.Text: Is this you wanting to come over and avenge your Shangshang?

122450004.Text: Of course I don't like that Shangshang lost! But... I'm not fitting to get on to the Wardance stage...

122450005.Text: Wait, we're getting off track. I'm trying to warn you

122450006.Text: There are mean comments and rumors about Luka all over the net at the moment

122450007.Text: People are saying that he took a bribe from the IPC and was specifically sabotaging the local Xianzhou competitors!

122450008.Text: They say that you're hurting the honor of the Xianzhou people, that you're IPC dogs... and some have even said they'll hire professionals to come and teach you a lesson off-line...

122450009.Text: Ah, it's all very terrible, basically

122450010.Text: That's not unusual. You never know if the person you're talking to on the internet is even human

122450011.Text: I know, but you have to tell Luka to maintain a positive attitude and not let these rumors affect his performance

122450012.Text: We can't change how other people think, but you shouldn't believe it!

122450013.Text: Of course I don't believe them! I've seen everything there is on the internet

122450014.Text: I just hope that Luka will maintain a positive attitude and not let the rumors affect his performance

122450015.Text: He's the man who took Shangshang's hopes of victory on his shoulders and kept fighting all this time. I hope that he can see this tournament through to the very end!

122450016.Text: I'll let him know of your thoughts. See you soon

Choices.Text: You should believe me over them

122460001.Text: {NICKNAME}, do you have time to chat?

122460002.Text: I'm quite free right now. Chat away

122460005.Text: We can chat if it's not too long

122460008.Text: I don't know if it's because of the pressure of the Wardance ceremony or something else

122460009.Text: I keep dreaming about dueling different opponents

122460010.Text: ...I don't remember much about the dreams, but... I think I lost so many times

122460011.Text: Poor child, you lost even in dreams?

122460012.Text: I don't really care about the wins and losses in dreams

122460013.Text: This is a manifestation of being overwhelmed by stress

122460015.Text: Yanqing, you know about Penacony, right? Go there and dream some sweet dreams about beating your opponents

122460016.Text: I don't think that dreaming about "defeating someone in the dream" is necessarily good...

122460018.Text: Even though I was dreaming, the opponents each time were different

122460019.Text: I remember there was a spear trial, an pe trial, a greatsword trial, a glaive trial... I even fought myself once

122460020.Text: But no matter which trial it was, I keep feeling it had the vaguest of connections with you, {NICKNAME}

122460021.Text: It's like you brought these opponents to face me...

122460022.Text: What do you mean? Are you looking to avenge yourself?

122460025.Text: I admit, I sent all the opponents you faced while dreaming

122460027.Text: It was just some hazy dreams that I had

122460028.Text: I... don't think I'm capable of influencing other people's dreams yet

122460029.Text: I don't think this is something you did, {NICKNAME}

122460030.Text: It was just some hazy dreams that I had

122460031.Text: "That which one thinks about during the day is what one dream about at night"

122460032.Text: These dreams must be a projection of my desire to spar with you, {NICKNAME}

122460034.Text: I completely understand now. You want me to come and give you some guidance

122460036.Text: If you have the time, please enlighten me

122460037.Text: Don't be too hasty. When you think you've had some improvement, we can always try again

122460039.Text: It feels so much better to say what's on my mind. Thank you. I shall bother you another day

Choices.Text: I don't have that kind of power

127000001.Text:
I am the president of the Hexanexus secret society. We are called the Hex Club.

"Have you heard of the Hexanexus?"

I have posed this question to countless people. Those I asked eventually began to learn about it, were saved by it, were moved by it, and became inspired by it.

There are innumerable masterpieces in the Artisanship Commission, but never has there been a pice de rsistance that symbolizes the artistry and workmanship of craftsmen  until the Hexanexus disrupted the status quo. To us, the Hexanexus represents the heart and soul of craft masters, and the original intent of creation. Only with such a soul can one begin their first step on the path to mastery. We who still walk the path will inevitably experience joy and sorrow, but as long as the Hexanexus exists, we can look at the future with hope and smiles.

Our society's goal is to spread unforeseen joy and passion to all the people in the world through the Hexanexus, to fill life with curiosity and euphoria.

With Utmost Respect,
The Hex Club

127000004.Text: What kind of super long text is this? You got the wrong person

127000006.Text: Where did you get my contact details from?

127000007.Text: That's not important. What's important is that we found you

127000008.Text: We noticed you have engaged with our Hexanexus devices multiple times and had taken the treasure from the chests

127000010.Text: That is your treasure chest... So?

127000011.Text: You took our treasure chest and have the gall to be so obnoxious. You must have done many similar deeds

127000012.Text: But this time, it's not the same. You know, we can report you to the Realm-Keeping Commission

127000013.Text: You say that's your treasure chest. Have you any proof

127000014.Text: I knew someone will try and lie their way out of it. We wrote our names there. You didn't read it properly, did ya?

127000015.Text: You know, we can report you to the Realm-Keeping Commission

127000016.Text: The devices are left on the side of the road, and no one is there to lay claim. Pls forgive me

127000017.Text: No use trying to wiggle out of this now. You know, we can always report you to the Realm-Keeping Commission

127000018.Text: However, us Hex Club is a reasonable organization. I promise you, so long as you continue to play with our Hexanexus devices, we won't make a report

127000019.Text: Also, if you complete all Hexanexus puzzles, we will present you with a Lifetime Member to the Secret Society

127000020.Text: I can continue to solve the Hexanexus, but will I be able to continue taking the treasures?

127000022.Text: That's part of the publicity budget

127000023.Text: But here's a warning. If you want out, you'll have to reimburse in double

127000024.Text: This is blackmail! I'll report you!

127000025.Text: You can report us to the Realm-Keeping Commission, but you will lose

127000026.Text: After all, we just set the devices down next to the road. You were the one who used them

127000027.Text: However, if you continue solving them, all these treasures will be yours

127000028.Text: For as long as you continue to solve the Hexanexus, you will be our {F#sister}{M#brother} from another mother

127000030.Text: Keep playing with the Hexanexus. We'll be in touch

Choices.Text: Where did you get the contact info?
Did it have your name on it?
I didn't think anyone wanted it
Is the chest still up for grabs?

127010001.Text:
The purpose of this questionnaire is to collect feedback about the Hexanexus' beta implementation. We hope you will be as honest with us as possible, and we have prepared some gifts for those with the most sincere answers.

Your answers will not be revealed to any third party. Thank you for supporting the Hexanexus secret society!

127010005.Text: I do not identify as either male or female

127010010.Text: Do you know what the Hexanexus is?

127010011.Text: I know what the Hexanexus is

127010012.Text: I do not know what the Hexanexus is

127010013.Text: The Hexanexus is what you have been playing with

127010014.Text: Hexa... I don't even know how to say that word

127010015.Text: Hexanexus, as in a connective construct of six faces

127010016.Text: How did you come to know about the Hexanexus?

127010017.Text: They were on the side of the road, and I saw them. That's how

127010018.Text: My friend recommended them to me

127010019.Text: I found out about the Hexanexus through the official account

127010020.Text: We... don't have an official account?

127010021.Text: It could be a promotional account trying to feed off your popularity

127010022.Text: It could be a fake account. There might be an imposter

127010023.Text: If we were so popular, we wouldn't be setting up so many devices on the side of the road

127010024.Text: How difficult do you think our Hexanexus is?

127010028.Text: Do you have any other comments about our Hexanexus?

127010029.Text: It is a masterpiece, a thing of geniuses

127010030.Text: It's intriguing. I don't have other comments

127010031.Text: It is a waste of my precious time

127010032.Text:
Thank you for participating in our questionnaire.
Please continue to support the Hexanexus!

Choices.Text: Can't be defined by two genders
Don't even recognize the first word
Saw it next to the road

127020001.Text: Congratulations on completing all Hexanexus in the beta!

127020002.Text: You completed all the Hexanexus stages. You must find the Hexanexus engaging!

127020003.Text: Of course it's engaging. That's why I continued playing!

127020004.Text: I wanted to stop, but the treasures you give are too enticing

127020005.Text: If I don't continue, aren't you going to report me at the Realm-Keeping Commission? I'm scared

127020006.Text: If I may be honest with you, according to the Hex Club's prediction, a lot of people will fall in love and be obsessed with our Hexanexus

127020007.Text: But from the current statistics, only you have been able to complete all the challenges. The success rate is very low

127020008.Text: I'm the only one who completed all the stages? But your Hexanexus is so interesting. I don't believe you

127020010.Text: Aren't you proficient in blackmailing? You can always report them. I'm not the only one you blackmailed, am I?

127020011.Text: The Hex Club treats all friends who successfully retrieve the treasures in the same way

127020012.Text: Although, none of them had taken heed of the warning from the Hex Club

127020013.Text: WHAT!? So I'm the only one who spent so much time completing all the challenges? I've been such a fool

127020014.Text: It wasn't all that bad. We promised to give you the treasures as long as you keep playing

127020015.Text: And we did keep the promise. You took all the treasures from the challenge

127020016.Text: Anyway, we hope to have a meeting with you. The intent of this meeting is: 1. To award you the Lifetime Hex Club Membership, and 2. to explore in-depth about your user experience and get some feedback

127020017.Text: Not really interested in the lifetime membership. Maybe skip that

127020018.Text: Aside from the title, we also prepared a reward for the first world clear of the game. Your loss if you miss it

127020019.Text: But I already filled in the survey for you

127020020.Text: That survey didn't have enough variables. We can't use it as a reference

127020021.Text: We might as well talk to the target users face-to-face

127020022.Text: Just tell me where are we meeting

127020023.Text: Beside the Hexanexus device in the Artisanship Commission delve. I will be waiting for you there. Please make sure to come

Choices.Text: Too many goodies in the chest
Weren't you going to sue me?
Go sue them at the Realm-Keeping Commission

127030001.Text: You have completed the new round of the Hexanexus

127030002.Text: I guess not even our internal testers understood the Hexanexus as much as you did

127030003.Text: To be frank, the new Hexanexus garnered equal amounts of positive and negative attention

127030004.Text: One of the main issues was "The devices are too abrupt and lack reasonable marketing"

127030005.Text: It is pretty abrupt. Expecting people to just play with something on the side of the street is quite a reach

127030006.Text: You're right, but we didn't really have a choice

127030007.Text: Your Hexanexus devices can't really be marketed

127030008.Text: Hey, let's not speak in absolutes. We can always try

127030009.Text: It's easy. Even I can do it for you

127030010.Text: Oh, we wouldn't want to trouble you like this. We just wanted to hear the opinion of our invested users

127030011.Text: Our "storyteller" wants to give the Hexanexus an overarching theme in the marketing campaign. We have three general directions so far: Supernatural, cataclysmic, and anthropomorphic. Which one do you like best?

127030012.Text: Taking immersion into account, maybe you can try the supernatural route

127030013.Text: A mundane life in which extraordinary dangers lurk. Investigate the Hexanexus and explore the supernatural occurrences of the Xianzhou Luofu... Someone must walk toward the night in order to protect the dawn

127030014.Text: I think that's a good one

127030015.Text: Considering your product's vast worldview, maybe try a cataclysmic theme

127030016.Text: In a certain planet, the Antimatter Legion has already become an irrepressible force. Only by investigating the Hexanexus can you obtain its power to fight Destruction with Destruction...

127030017.Text: I think that's a good one

127030018.Text: Considering how popular your product has gotten, maybe try to anthropomorphize it

127030019.Text: In this fictional city, people live harmoniously with their Hex Maiden. Through solving the Hexanexus, you can deepen the bonds between yourself and your Hex Maiden. What a good life that is

127030020.Text: I think that's a good one

127030021.Text: Thank you for your help. I will discuss your suggestions with the club members

127030022.Text: Anyhow, I'll go back and do some brainstorming, and we will see you again for the next version

Choices.Text: Easy, I'll polish it for you

127040000.Text:
Since you've already collected a certain amount of Hex Passes, we would like to invite you to participate in a feedback questionnaire regarding any suggestions you have during the "Hexanexus: Remake" beta. We hope you will be as honest with us as possible.

Your answers will not be revealed to any third party. Thank you for supporting the Hexanexus secret society!

127040001.Text: Have you noticed that you have already obtained Hex Passes?

127040005.Text: You'd definitely have noticed it by now.

127040006.Text: Have you played a Hexanexus before?

127040009.Text: I'm a deep tester, and I even hold a Lifetime Hex Club Membership!

127040011.Text: The Hexanexus official site has announced that its Lifetime Hex Club Membership service and other member services were suspended thirty system days ago. Thank you for supporting the Hex Club all this time

127040012.Text: Do you know what "Hexanexus: Remake" is?

127040013.Text: I know what Hexanexus: Remake is

127040014.Text: I don't know what Hexanexus: Remake is

127040015.Text: You have already obtained a Hex Pass. What you just played was "Hexanexus: Remake"!

127040016.Text: Is it not Hexanexus: Remastered? Why must you use "Remake"?

127040017.Text: Hexanexus is designed, produced, and developed by a multicultural team of people.

127040018.Text: The word "Remake" brings out the diversity presented in our product that accommodates users across the Cosmos.

127040019.Text: How do you find Hexanexus: Remake's difficulty level?

127040023.Text: Do you have any additional questions or suggestions for "Hexanexus: Remake"?

127040024.Text: Are your rewards becoming less than before? You can't retain previous players this way

127040025.Text: It's a little hard to get around that right now

127040026.Text: My biggest confusion is why there are also Hexanexus here in the Ten-Lords Commission's Shackling Prison?

127040028.Text: Why does Hexanexus even want to make a sequel?

127040029.Text: Of course, it's because Hexanexus is number one in the world!

127040030.Text: Okay, I know you have a lot of questions.

127040031.Text: You have collected 3 Hex Passes, I will contact you again when you've collected 6.

127040032.Text:
Thank you for participating in our feedback questionnaire.
Please continue to support "Hexanexus: Remake"!

Choices.Text: Do you know where this is?

127050000.Text: Congratulations, you have completed the entire beta version of "Hexanexus: Remake"!

127050001.Text: Since you are able to complete all of the puzzles, it must be because "Hexanexus: Remake" is extremely interesting, right?

127050002.Text: Hexanexus: Remake is the best in the world!

127050003.Text: There's nothing better to do. I solved them while pacing around the prison

127050004.Text: I have many questions. You said I have to finish collecting everything before you will contact me

127050005.Text: You must've noticed that this "Hexanexus: Remake" beta test and development environment isn't your run-of-the-mill one

127050006.Text: To be able to heavily market "Hexanexus: Remake" in The Shackling Prison is a whole new challenge for me too

127050007.Text: Do you know why I'm massively investing in promoting a new title here?

127050008.Text: Is it alluding to the fact that your trash game is so torturous that it's no different from being in prison?

127050009.Text: Your marketing team is incompetent too?

127050010.Text: Could it be that the Ten-Lords Commission sponsored your lousy game?

127050011.Text: I was arrested for making games

127050013.Text: Are you making games, or doing scams?

127050014.Text: I already knew that you'd get arrested sooner or later for putting these Hexanexus all over the place

127050015.Text: As for the details, we'll talk when we meet

127050016.Text: I'll be right here in The Shackling Prison. Could you meet me if you have the time? I can't exactly go anywhere

127050017.Text: Tell me where we should meet

127050018.Text: I've sent you the cell's location

Choices.Text: Game's as bad as being in prison?

130010005.Text: Alright, let's see what the conductor has to say first.

130010006.Text: Are we ready to set off to the next stop?

130010007.Text: We sure are! The warp jump device is all calibrated.

130010008.Text: But, as the Express conductor, I have three things I wanted to stress before we depart.

130010009.Text: That's why I'm here for this little Express meeting, too.

130010010.Text: Alright! Then you know the rules.

130010011.Text: We'll meet in the Parlor Car!

130020000.Text: Hello, {M#Mr.}{F#Ms.} {NICKNAME}. Someone just donated a dream bubble to our store. After conducting psychometric spectral analysis on it, I suspect you would be interested in the contents of this dream bubble.

130020002.Text: Don't worry, all the dreams in our store have been strictly inspected and there is absolutely no possibility of hidden harm.

130020004.Text: How did you know I'd be interested?

130020006.Text: The donor is an elegant lady with the name "Black Swan." If you have the time, we would love to have you any time.

Choices.Text: How did you know I'd be interested?

130030000.Text: Himeko invited {NICKNAME}, March, and Welt to join the group chat

130030004.Text: It doesn't feel very real. It's odd. I can't describe it

130030005.Text: We're in a dream, after all

130030007.Text: I saw a guy wearing a plaster head sculpture at the auction, and he walked off without doing anything. That's pretty suspicious

130030008.Text: I also had some unpleasant discoveries. It's a bit complicated. It's best if we meet up face-to-face.

130030010.Text: Looks like a trip back to reality is overdue

130030011.Text: Let's meet up in my room

So, I was hoping you could lend me 50,000 credits. Once I return to the Xianzhou, I'll pay you back tenfold and even let you choose anything you desire from our precious Vidyadhara treasures.

130100000.Text: [Luofu Realm-Keeping Commission: Emergency Management Center] Attention! You may have received a fraudulent message from an impersonator or a counterfeiter's account. Your account is at risk of fraud and has been temporarily frozen. The corresponding amount has been returned to your account. We strongly advise against disclosing any personal information or initiating financial transfers in response to such messages. If you have any inquiries or need to report a case, please contact our staff at the Realm-Keeping Commission.

130100001.Text: [Luofu Realm-Keeping Commission: Emergency Management Center] Attention! The Realm-Keeping Commission is dedicated to preventing fraud and ensuring your safety. Please be cautious when receiving messages from unfamiliar sources. Avoid accessing suspicious links, and always verify with the intended individual before making any financial transfers. If you have fallen victim to a scam, please remain calm and promptly report the incident to our office.

130240020.Text: After spending some time in the Simulated Universe, I've gained some insights about the laws of the universe that I'd like to share with you.

130240022.Text: When I went deeper into the Simulated Universe, I saw a black hole. What exactly am I discussing when I talk about a black hole? I guess it's a kind of mysticism, given it is one of the most mysterious phenomena in the universe. It has such a strong gravitational field that even the light is sucked into it. It's a masterpiece of general relativity, a being so colossal that it distorts space and time in an almost unimaginable way.

130240023.Text: Will I see the core of Nihility after passing through the black hole? It gives me a sense of detachment as if it is the graveyard of space and time. We might be reluctant to admit it, but it undoubtedly exists. When we stand face to face with each other, there is a massive black hole between us.

130420007.Text: I see you're on high alert. What would you have me do to prove I am "me"?

130420008.Text: Some unique linguistic habits, like whether you add full-stops or not to messages

130420009.Text: Some unique actions you do out of habit, like looking in the mirror a lot

130420010.Text: But, if that little Miss Fool excels in observation, there is a chance that she could perfectly imitate everything about a person.

130420011.Text: I think that the only thing that can differentiate someone from another is their "memories." There is no way for an outsider to completely steal or imitate every ounce of a person's memory.

130420012.Text: It's just like when we met in Penacony, is it not? A strange dreamland surrounding us, a series of strange murders, people with differing dreams, the truth that lies beneath the water's surface...

130420014.Text: Do you need me to go on?

130420017.Text: I can't be the one doing all the talking. By your logic, you should also have to prove that you are not Sparkle, {NICKNAME}.

130420020.Text: I'm just joking. As a Memokeeper, I naturally know who the person is on the other side of my screen.

130420021.Text: Miss Sparkle's pranks are not without their benefits, she is able to make us re-examine what we have seen and think about the appearance and reality of the Dreamscape. This is also the reason that I shared the dream bubble with you.

130420022.Text: Alright, looks like she hasn't caused any major damage, I will put my mind at ease. Talk to you again soon!

130430001.Text: Special Deal! Spend 46,700,000 Alfalfa credits to enjoy a 12% discount on an additional item.

130430002.Text: Discounted items include, but are not limited to: Jewelry, watches, bags, high-quality tailored clothing items, and more. Our distinguished customers are welcome to stop by and make a selection as they please when visiting the Oti Mall.

130430003.Text: For detailed information regarding the sales event, please speak to the store manager Cocona.

130500000.Text: Dearest customer, thank you for experiencing the Dreamscape immersive game Hanu's Adventure brought by Clock Studios. We hope that you had an enjoyable experience! Please do let us know how you would rate your gaming experience: 1: Great, 2: Good. Please respond with the corresponding number alone. We look forward to your response!

130500002.Text: Thank you for your feedback, we wish you a pleasant time in the dreamland

130500004.Text: Thank you for your feedback, we wish you a pleasant time in the dreamland

130500005.Text: Why can I only rate it good?

130500006.Text: The existence of a negative rating would expose the Dreamweavers to negative emotions and lead to unnecessary risks being taken in the game design. Therefore, we have not created a channel for negative feedback, we hope that you will understand.

130500007.Text: If you are unsatisfied with your gaming experience, please complete offline feedback with Clock Studios Theme Park. We will be sure to accept any suggestions you make and present them to the designers in a tactful way.

130500008.Text: Clock Studios has prepared a great number of clearance rewards for customers inside the game scene, as well as a limited-edition Hanu's Adventure storybook.

130500009.Text: However, please be aware: If any special content unrelated to cartoon characters such as Clockie, Brother Hanu, Boss Stone etc. should appear inside the storybook, you are advised to stop reading immediately and destroy the book.

130500012.Text: Is it safe for me to read?

130500013.Text: I won't be put behind bars for this, will I?

130500014.Text: This question will not be answered in accordance with Clock Studios customer service guidelines. However, in order to ensure that you do not encounter anything unexpected within the Dreamscape, please make sure to honor this warning.

130500015.Text: If you can just listen to this suggestion, you will have a joyful dream adventure! I hope that you will reap great happiness inside this cartoon world we have created!

Choices.Text: What happens if I read it?

130510000.Text: Dearest customer, congratulations on completing the first challenge of Hanu's Adventure! I believe you have collected all of the five limited-edition storybooks that we distributed?

130510001.Text: May I ask if you discovered any content that was not associated with the Clockie cartoon while reading?

130510002.Text: There was some strange content, it didn't seem like a cartoon story

130510003.Text: It is possible that you received one of our faulty products, my sincerest apologies. In consideration of your safety, please destroy the defective storybook immediately.

130510004.Text: Nothing at all, it just all seemed like children's stories

130510005.Text: Understood. If in the future you do obtain a Hanu's Adventure storybook and discover any strange content inside, please make sure to destroy it immediately.

130510006.Text: I don't know, I didn't read a word.

130510007.Text: That is a real shame, Brother Hanu's story is very interesting. I would ask that if you do get time, you give it a read!

130510008.Text: If in future you do obtain a Hanu's Adventure storybook and discover any strange content inside, please make sure to destroy it immediately.

130510009.Text: Furthermore, follow-up content for Hanu's Adventure is currently in development. You will be able to experience a brand-new story of Brother Hanu in the Dreamscape very soon. Stay tuned!

130520002.Text: Tick, tock, tick, tock, tick, tock, tick...

130520005.Text: Tick-tock, The Reverie, tick-tock, the snooker room, tick-tock...

130540000.Text: How much do you know about The Reverie's indefinite closure?

130540001.Text: "The Reverie located in Golden Hour is currently undergoing renovations." I am sure that every guest has seen this notice on their Dreamscape Pass. Certainly, the majority of guests will have no reason to doubt this official explanation provided by The Family. However, should one have a particular hunger for the truth, they may not have to delve too deep in order to find holes in this story.

130540002.Text: If you are naturally a person of truth and integrity and wish to explore the truth, please feel free to contact Singler, investigative reporter of the Sweet Dream Times. Together, we will expose the truth behind the closure of The Reverie that The Family seeks to cover up.

130550000.Text: I see you have collected enough origami birds

130550001.Text: It is time to claim your reward

130550002.Text: "Thank you for your contribution to Dreamville." That's what the script says.

130550003.Text: Find me outside the hotel <u>VIP Lounge, in front of the giant clock</u>.

130570000.Text:
To the dear citizens of Penacony:
This is a group message sent to everyone in the late Emperor's phone contacts.
The late Emperor ruled in the land of dreams for many years, governing with virtue and earning the love of the people. However, due to reasons in the real world, she had no choice but to abdicate the throne to me, having me fulfill her unrealized ambitions.
The Tizocic Dynasty will bear witness over generations, passing down its legacy, and continue to watch over its people until the end of time. If there are urgent matters that require help, please do not bear it alone, and contact me.
Also: To facilitate my subjects who have been unable to enter their dreams due to various circumstances, I will establish an administrative office at The Reverie Hotel in the real world. If there are important matters to discuss, please leave your dream and seek me out.
Second Emperor of the Tizocic Dynasty, Tizocic III

130610003.Text: The Ruff Tape was the killer, not the victim.

130610004.Text: He lured the boss with the excuse of giving him the evidence and killed him.

130610005.Text: With the loud music, the witnesses all assumed the tape was the victim.

130610006.Text: Of course, aside from the sounds they play, all the tapes in Penacony look the same.

130610007.Text: Finally, he put his boss's tape inside himself, stealing the other's sound and identity before fleeing the scene.

130610008.Text: The key clue was that the tape inside his body had been fixed before.

130610009.Text: Even in the end, I have no clue what his boss had on him.

130610010.Text: Ah, don't think about that stuff.

130610011.Text: They're supposed to be cassette tapes. How could they be so cruel?

130610013.Text: It was all thanks to your help this time, otherwise the truth would've been lost forever.

130610014.Text: Looking forward to working with you again in the future.

130620000.Text: Sorry, I didn't find the killer in the end.

130620001.Text: There just weren't enough clues at the scene. I plan to investigate the victim's whereabouts leading up to their deaths.

130620002.Text: When you crack the case, call me first so we can celebrate together.

130620004.Text: The criminal is a vicious one. Be careful when conducting your investigation.

130620005.Text: I will. Thanks for the concern.

130630001.Text: Never experienced a lightness and joy like this in my life.

130630005.Text: I'm done with this detective stuff, friend.

130630006.Text: Farewell, I'm going on vacation at the Blue Hour.

130720000.Text: Greetings, are you interested in earning a little extra something?

130720001.Text: Due to recent incidents in Penacony, The Family is short-staffed and is now hiring Dreamchasers with exceptional skills as temporary security officers. Applicants who have annihilated memes will be given preference.

130720002.Text: If you are interested, please contact me and proceed to Dewlight Pavilion for an on-site interview. It's first come, first served.

130730000.Text: Dear guest, you have completed 9 challenges in Hanu's Adventure and outperformed 99.99% of other players!

130730001.Text: Whoa! I always impress, don't I?

130730002.Text: Haha, you're definitely a skilled gamer.

130730003.Text: Hold up. I just finished a few levels, and I'm already beating 99.99% of players?

130730004.Text: Yeah, the entrance of this game is intentionally hidden to provide players with a sense of surprise, and this results in a low participation rate.

130730005.Text: By the way, we have received feedback from guests that more and more unusual content has appeared in the Hanu's Adventure storybooks.

130730006.Text: As far as we know, the Bloodhound Family has initiated an investigation, and this might cause inconvenience for the owners of these books... If you come across any such issues, we kindly request you to destroy those erratic storybooks...

130730008.Text: <color=#dbc291ff>But hey, if you're *cool* and brave enough to chase the truth despite the risks, remember his story.</color>

130730012.Text: Are you still there, dear guest?

130730013.Text: Anyway, there will be more levels in Hanu's Adventure for you to discover in the future. Keep up the excellent work and become the best "Brother Hanu"!

130740000.Text: Dear visitor, according to the Bloodhound Family, Clock Studios Theme Park is currently undergoing a security check, so the main gate is temporarily closed.

130740001.Text: However, to satisfy our customers, we will continue providing the amusement program, "Clockie's Extras Filming Experience," where you can enjoy fun games and learn about the creation of the animations Hamster Ball Knight and Brother Hanu.

130740002.Text: Didn't you just say the park is closed?

130740003.Text: Why can we still participate in the program?

130740004.Text: As you may be aware, Clock Studios was not founded by The Family.

130740005.Text: We will operate based on our Chairman, the Watchmaker's, philosophy. We won't compromise our own interests for The Family.

130740007.Text: Is it because the other programs aren't fun enough?

130740008.Text: Because this is our flagship program and has been the highest-rated one at the park for years.

130740009.Text: But of course, there are other reasons, but let's not get into that right now.

130740011.Text: I want to play something else.

130740012.Text: You are free to choose, of course. However, please be aware that if you encounter an accident in another program, Clock Studios Theme Park will not be held responsible.

130740013.Text: For your information, you can create your own animation in this program, and if your work is good enough, it might even get officially released in theaters!

130740014.Text: As a reminder to you, the ownership and intellectual property rights of the animation you produce using Clock Studios' facilities, along with related rights and interests, belong to Clock Studios. Clock Studios has the right to retain and dispose of the content, and any revenue generated from the content will belong to Clock Studios.

130740016.Text: Is this some kind of scam?

130740017.Text: Please don't worry. These are merely measures for copyright protection.

130740018.Text: So, everything I create belongs to you?

130740019.Text: Is this idea to help your animation team slack off?

130740020.Text: Sorry for the confusion. While we are delighted to share our animations with guests, we need to protect our studio's intellectual property.

130740021.Text: If your animation gets officially released in theaters, you'll get a 1.5-second shout-out in the credits.

130740022.Text: Too long. Didn't understand a thing.

130740023.Text: Sorry, but compared to copyright protection terms elsewhere in the universe, like those of Interastral Peace Entertainment, our terms are already quite concise and clear. Their interactive projects often require tens of thousands of words to be displayed before playing.

130740024.Text: If you are interested, please find a yellow-haired Pepeshi employee at the park entrance, and he will guide you through the program.

130740025.Text: Please remember the password for Dreamville. "Hmhm! Charrrrrrge!"

130740027.Text: Your friend "Clock Studios Customer Service" is offline.

130780001.Text: Master Gongshu, there's something I want to talk with you about

130780002.Text: General Huaiyan gave the Luofu a sword called Guyun

130780003.Text: Don't you worry. General Huaiyan has already conferred his instructions.

130780004.Text: Right, I heard from my apprentices that a young lady with a sword barged into the Artisanship Commission.

130780005.Text: That's General Huaiyan's granddaughter, right? Is she here to chat or kidnap me?

130780006.Text: She already promised me that she wouldn't take Guyun until we've confirmed the situation.

130780007.Text: What? She's coming to steal the sword?

130780008.Text: My nerves can't take much more of this!

130780009.Text: The Knight of Beauty just escorted the sword to the Artisanship Commission. It is currently in the armory without a chance for compromise or mishaps. You just relax.

130780010.Text: When I have time, I want to hear that girl tell me why she tried to steal the blade!

130790002.Text: Are you able to cooperate with us for a bit? Care to come by the Artisanship Commission?

130790004.Text: To make a long story short, the Artisanship Commission received a sword yesterday from General Huaiyan. Today, when they checked in, the sword had vanished.

130790005.Text: Did something happen to the sword?

130790006.Text: Whoa. I didn't even say anything. How'd you know?

130790007.Text: That's correct. The Artisanship Commission said they received a sword yesterday from General Huaiyan. Today, when we checked in, the sword had vanished.

130790008.Text: Anyway, the Realm-Keeping Commission is officially conducting an investigation and is interrogating the relevant individuals.

130790010.Text: C'mon, {F#young lady}{M#my lad}, it's just a routine questioning.

130790011.Text: But you did attend the sword-gifting ceremony yesterday at the Palace of Astrum. And some craftsmen said they saw you at the Artisanship Commission.

130790012.Text: I even told Master Gongshu yesterday to keep careful watch on the sword. Does he know about the current situation?

130790014.Text: Anyway, anyone who attended yesterday's ceremony and lacks a clear alibi will be considered a suspect.

130790015.Text: The craftsmen also mentioned a young girl who broke into the Artisanship Commission with a sword in hand. She bears the bulk of the suspicion.

130790016.Text: Alright. Enough chatter. I'll see you at the Artisanship Commission.
