201440001.Text: Check this out! I'm on a planet famous for its island resorts!

201440002.Text: It's only 05:00 system hour here, still early in the morning, but there are already a bunch of people out surfing!

201440003.Text: You know, when the ocean mirrors the sky, it's hard to tell if they're right in front of me or far off in the distance. It's almost like they're soaring on the horizon

201440004.Text: Have you ever had that feeling?

201440006.Text: Still... It's 5 AM. Why are you up so early?

201440007.Text: I'm up early every day. Bet you didn't expect that!

201440008.Text: But you're up really early too

201440009.Text: I don't need sleep. Bet you didn't expect that!

201440012.Text: I was born without the ability to dream, and I sleep much less than most. A quick rest is enough to fill me with energy

201440013.Text: That's why I love climbing to high places at the break of dawn

201440014.Text: Whether it's by the ocean, in the forest, or up in the mountains, I just love watching the sunrise and feeling the start of a new day in every world

201440015.Text: It's an incredible feeling. Give it a go when you can!

201440016.Text: Sounds amazing. Take me with you next time!

201440019.Text: I was worried that you might say no!

201440020.Text: I'm not really a morning person...

201440021.Text: The trailblazing expedition can get really intense. But if you can wake me up early...

201440024.Text: I'm super busy in the morning. I have training at 4 AM

201440025.Text: Ever seen the Astral Express at 4 AM?

201440029.Text: They're just bugs. Nothing to be scared of

201440032.Text: Plus, I can just stay back

201450013.Text: But I get the feeling there's more to it than that

201450015.Text: If you only consider its appearance, it's certainly not top-grade

201450016.Text: Did you stumble upon it by the roadside?

201450024.Text: Are you planning to turn the Express into a crystal ornament too?

201450025.Text: I need to tell the conductor this right away!

201450027.Text: I hope the story didn't scare you too much

201460000.Text: {NICKNAME}, do you know anything about "managing up"?

201460001.Text: I heard it's a really popular concept among younger professionals

201460003.Text: If work is overwhelming you, reach out to your manager and pass some their way. If it isn't, pass some their way anyway!

201460004.Text: That's a unique way to look at it

201460005.Text: Mm-hmm. "If work is overwhelming you, reach out to your manager and pass some their way. If it isn't, pass some their way anyway," right?

201460006.Text: But I think it's unrealistic. Constantly clashing with your manager is a surefire way to get fired, isn't it

201460007.Text: It looks like you have a good understanding of it

201460008.Text: The young employees at the IPC have been talking about it, and their views have reached my ears

201460009.Text: Sentiments toward "managing up" largely depend on their supervisor's management style

201460010.Text: "Director Topaz may be a woman of swift and decisive action, but she listens to advice where she should."

201460011.Text: "Director Aventurine has a sharp eye for everything. Putting the initial 'whys' and 'hows' aside, if he says something can be done, then it will get done."

201460014.Text: Can't tell... I've got a feeling that nobody can "managing up" with you

201460015.Text: Hmm... Or maybe it's the exact opposite

201460016.Text: The world of youths is a vibrant and dynamic one. The new generation inevitably surpasses the old

201460017.Text: But before that happens, as one who walks before them, I'll help them become the best versions of themselves

201460018.Text: So this is the reason behind the workaholic culture at the IPC

201460019.Text: Diligence and fortitude are the keys to growth

201460020.Text: Not everyone gets the opportunity to climb higher

201460021.Text: Do the Ten Stonehearts need to polish themselves too?

201460022.Text: Absolutely. Chiselling the Cornerstones is just the beginning

201460023.Text: Only by steadily tempering our hearts and building unbreakable walls can we broaden our horizons

201460024.Text: From what I've seen, {NICKNAME}, you're a rare and unique gem

201460025.Text: If you're interested, why not come to the IPC and experience for yourself our uncompromising dedication to polishing oneself?

Choices.Text: Heard of it, but it's unrealistic

201470001.Text: I'd like to hear your thoughts on "kids"

201470002.Text: I don't have kids, so I might not be the best person to ask

201470003.Text: That's okay. We were all once kids anyway, so I'm really interested in hearing your views

201470004.Text: Kid at your service. Ask away!

201470005.Text: That's the spirit! I can't wait to hear your opinion

201470006.Text: What do you think will make a child happy?

201470007.Text: Being well-fed, well-clothed, and well-loved by their family  just like how the Crew is!

201470008.Text: Sounds like the Crew shares a really close bond. May that happiness stay with you forever

201470010.Text: You're right. A child's world should be innocent and carefree

201470012.Text: Yeah, sometimes happiness is just hard to put into words

201470013.Text: I asked Topaz and Aventurine the same question

201470014.Text: Their definitions of happiness have changed and now vary from each other's, but on the topic of "what makes a child happy," they share the same view as you

201470015.Text: The children in the orphanage would probably wish for the same things too

201470016.Text: The children's wishes? Anything I can help with?

201470017.Text: Thanks for the offer, but I can handle it

201470018.Text: The kids have given me unconditional trust, and I'll reciprocate in kind with all my heart

201470020.Text: Yes, I go there all the time

201470022.Text: Well... I've heard stories about the Bonajade Exchange

201470023.Text: I see... No need to worry. After all, in the case of adults, choices made must be much stricter

201470024.Text: The kids have given me unconditional trust, and I'll reciprocate in kind with all my heart

201470025.Text: In any case, it's about time I head off

Choices.Text: I've heard stories about the Exchange

201480003.Text: It's been a while since I heard such a normal greeting, it's really comforting

201480006.Text: Well, discovering the "unknown" is also the essence of journeys

201480007.Text: Before coming to Penacony, I thought it would be just a regular trip

201480008.Text: To fulfill a dead man's wish and take him back to a place he could never return to

201480009.Text: But before I knew it, this world became so vibrant and colorful

201480010.Text: And I've become a part of it

201480014.Text: It's all thanks to you, Nameless, and the other Pathstriders

201480015.Text: I'm a part of it too!

201480019.Text: As this journey comes to an end, let's wake up and embrace tomorrow

201480020.Text: May we all appreciate the beauty of the world on a larger vista

Choices.Text: I'm a part of it too!

201490002.Text: Earlier, I helped this lady in Penacony without realizing she's actually a chef at a fancy restaurant. This is her restaurant

201490003.Text: She'll be launching a special menu with a "peach" theme soon, and I highly recommend it

201490004.Text: I'm definitely giving it a shot!

201490007.Text: Sounds "avant-garde," maybe something on the dark side of the cooking...

201490008.Text: Dark side...? Does that mean there is a light side of the cooking as well?

201490009.Text: Cooking... well, it brings back memories. I used to love it

201490010.Text: However, it's hard to enjoy dishes when you can't really taste anything

201490012.Text: Is this caused by the Nihility?

201490014.Text: Sometimes, I still cook up some food, but it's a shame that I can't taste much anymore

201490015.Text: Still, there are some workarounds. For example, you can make ice cream out of snow

201490016.Text: It's cool, moist, and creamy... a flavor that I'll never forget

201490017.Text: I'll treat you to it when I get the chance

201490018.Text: And don't forget to try the peach dishes too

Choices.Text: I'm definitely giving it a shot!
Is this caused by the Nihility?

201500000.Text: Oh, by the way, I came across something cute recently

201500001.Text: As I was passing by the COLORS store, the store clerk asked for my autograph

201500002.Text: Well, you're totally a celebrity now with everything you've done!

201500005.Text: Was it a misunderstanding or something...?

201500007.Text: Your autograph? I want one too!

201500010.Text: Miss Robin's makeup in the COLORS ad "Mien of Vesper" bears a resemblance to the attire of young girls from my hometown, leaving even me momentarily lost in nostalgia

201500011.Text: And now that I think about it, I miss how those girls would worry about their makeup getting ruined in frequent thunderstorms

201500012.Text: Oh, speaking of COLORS, I found some awesome products there, so I bought them as a small token of my appreciation

201500013.Text: I think Miss Himeko will love this rose-colored lipstick

201500014.Text: And this "Spring Scenery" eyeshadow will be perfect for Miss March

201500015.Text: Not only that, they have some hydrating and cleansing products that people are raving about

201500016.Text: Thank you! I'll spread the word!

201500018.Text: Didn't expect you to know so much about makeup

201500020.Text: I'll mail them to you before I forget

201500024.Text: By the way, do you know where the post office is?

Choices.Text: Your autograph? I want one too!
Didn't expect you to know about makeup

201510000.Text: {NICKNAME}, I heard about a new hotpot store. It's packed with people and has a snaking queue

201510001.Text: I heard the store signature is the "Tea Hotpot with Pickled Pepper and Chili Oil." There's only a limited amount sold every day. Do you want to try it with me?

201510002.Text: Let's go! Crowds mean good food!

201510003.Text: Let's go! Word on the street is that last night, some customers lined up till the store closed and still didn't get to eat anything

201510004.Text: Tea? Chili oil? Pickled pepper? Is that even edible?

201510005.Text: Of course. The premium tea broth is accompanied by chili oil, removing the spiciness and increasing the aroma and taste. You can have a bowl to sip before you eat, as soon as the hotpot is boiling

201510006.Text: We won't have to queue for years, right?

201510008.Text: Even on the Xianzhou, that much of a wait is a bit of a stretch

201510009.Text: Hold on, the online queue is opening. Time to fight for a number on the jade abacus

201510010.Text: Your friend Jiaoqiu has gone offline.

201510013.Text: Sounds like you didn't get a number. Do that many people want to eat this?

201510014.Text: As long as "limited" is in the marketing, it'll go viral one way or another

201510015.Text: The store is also offering a few new flavors for soup bases

201510016.Text: But I'm not sure if they're palatable for you

201510018.Text: Oof. This first one. I just can't

201510019.Text: And then, there's Tomato Hotpot with Arugula

201510021.Text: What if I say I can take them all?

201510022.Text: Brave warrior, I admire your courage

201510023.Text: For today's meal, I'll accompany your culinary choices till the end of the world!

201510024.Text: Then, I'll go ahead to queue up first

201510026.Text: Sorry, I really can't stomach this

201510027.Text: That's too bad. Guess I'll have to go alone

201510030.Text: You can still use your phone? I heard you got injured.

201510032.Text: Really? Your eyes are fine now?

201510034.Text: Don't worry, someone is accompanying me

201510035.Text: It won't impede my attempts at exploring a new hotpot place

201510036.Text: Really? Well, I was worried about nothing!

201510038.Text: Don't worry, someone is accompanying me

201510039.Text: It won't impede my attempts at exploring a new hotpot place

201510040.Text: I heard about a hotpot place that's been blowing up recently and is packed full of customers every day.

Choices.Text: You can still use your phone?
Doesn't seem I need to be worried then!
Let's go! Crowds mean good food!
We won't queue for years, right?
Sounds like you didn't get it
What if I say yes to all

201520000.Text: If any of you is recently experiencing loss of appetite or diarrhea, feel free to get some "Ginseng Vigor Dust" from the Yaoqing's military medical office

201520001.Text: Prescription: Take after meals, twice a day, one dose each in the morning and evening. Continue for 5 days. If no improvement, contact me anytime

201520002.Text: Okay doc. Give me a dose of Ginseng Vigor Dust then

201520003.Text: ...Apologies. Seems like I hit the wrong contacts for the group message

201520004.Text: Would you happen to need the medicine as well?

201520005.Text: Yes, because I entered a stupidly spicy challenge

201520007.Text: A few of the Yaoqing comrades have been suffering recently due to their meals

201520008.Text: Although I've already urged them to re-screen the food caterers, it's going to take some time for it to happen

201520009.Text: Also, foods that have conflicting properties, such as overly oily and spicy or too cold and too hot, may also cause gastrointestinal discomfort

201520010.Text: But you can't stop the ones who just love to chase the high of the thrill

201520011.Text: I just took a dose of Ginseng Vigor Dust myself, to be honest

201520012.Text: You too, huh... Then you're definitely feeling like me now

201520014.Text: No one can withstand the allure of a super spicy dish

201530000.Text: {NICKNAME}, do you know where the Ditings on the Xianzhou Luofu usually hang out?

201530002.Text: March said that, if you can't find them, you can howl twice to summon them

201530003.Text: Howl twice... That doesn't seem like a good idea

201530004.Text: I saw a Diting once at Starwatcher Avenue. It was chewing aggressively on a wooden table leg along the streets

201530005.Text: It looked really cute, but unfortunately, table legs can't really withstand a Diting's teeth

201530006.Text: It must be using the table leg as a chew stick

201530008.Text: But that table leg is tasteless despite its colors. The little Diting won't be satisfied chewing on it

201530009.Text: Since I have nothing to do on the Luofu at the time, I went ahead and made differently flavored chew sticks for it as a way to kill time

201530010.Text: It broke the table leg? Did the boss get the Diting to pay for the damage?

201530011.Text: Yeah, the boss was fuming and said he now has a bone to pick with the Artisanship Commission

201530012.Text: Luckily, I was passing by and helped it pay off the debt for the table leg

201530013.Text: You could even say that the Artisanship Commission now owes me a favor

201530014.Text: Since I have nothing to do on the Luofu at the time, I went ahead and made differently flavored chew sticks for it as a way to kill time

201530017.Text: I'm curious. What's the stick's flavor?

201530018.Text: To figure out this little fella's preference, I bought a classic flavored chew stick

201530019.Text: During the refinement process, I added a little cinnamon, mint, and grated cheese

201530021.Text: I'm kidding. I just happened to be preparing some fried chilis that look like chili but don't taste spicy at all

201530022.Text: There are a few leftover ingredients, just enough to make some chew sticks

201530023.Text: Pity. The little one won't be getting a taste of that for a while

Choices.Text: Using table legs as chew sticks?
Does the Diting need to compensate

201540000.Text: Grandpa says that the Astral Express has been everywhere

201540001.Text: Have you seen anyone weird recently?

201540002.Text: If someone looks weird, they could be in possession of a cursed sword

201540003.Text: I'm weird. What do you want?

201540006.Text: I'm quite good at judging people

201540007.Text: Nope, everyone looks normal to me

201540008.Text: Is there a possibility that you're the weird one?

201540010.Text: I know you don't have a cursed sword

201540011.Text: I'm quite good at judging people

201540012.Text: What type of weird are you talking about? I know plenty of weird people. Lemme grab one for you to have a chat

201540016.Text: It'll be quicker to just ask you lot about the whereabouts of the cursed swords

201540020.Text: There are a total of 1382 cursed swords forged by Hanguang

201540021.Text: I've only melted a little more than 300 of them!

201540022.Text: The cursed swords are bloodthirsty and love to kill. If you wield it, you'll become its puppet and turn into a puppet that only knows killing

201540023.Text: Any moment I don't act, the world would see more wronged souls and bloodshed

201540024.Text: I promised grandpa to wait a while, but I think I've waited long enough

201540025.Text: You said you've waited long enough. What's your grandpa's response to that?

201540027.Text: What's important is... I want to hunt! Down! All! Cursed! Swords!

201540028.Text: Don't give yourself too much pressure

201540030.Text: Yeah. How can I possibly let myself sleep easy at this age?

201540032.Text: You guys have seen a lot, if you do see any of these swords, please tell me

201540033.Text: I will not let a single cursed sword escape

Choices.Text: Don't give yourself too much pressure

201550001.Text: I'd like to talk to you for a bit

201550005.Text: Seems to be always saying strange things

201550006.Text: It's not like something that a sword might say

201550007.Text: Because it's a bat, not a sword

201550008.Text: Grandpa says that swords have no fixed shape

201550009.Text: Can you really hear swords speak?

201550012.Text: But I can't quite see through your sword

201550013.Text: Its vibe is pretty sharp and straightforward

201550014.Text: But it seems somewhat contradictory at the same time

201550015.Text: Its contradiction is filled with joy

201550016.Text: Yet that joy seems to have a tinge of bitterness to it

201550017.Text: Just lay it on me straight, master. What's wrong with my baby?

201550027.Text: All of the above are words said by your bat sword

201550028.Text: That's why I want to interact with it more

201550029.Text: The more I think about it, the more urgent it feels

201550030.Text: I think I shall come and look for you right this moment

Choices.Text: Can you really hear swords speak?

201560000.Text: I have gossip. Do you wanna hear it?

201560001.Text: There are people using delicious food to tempt a master into teaching them martial arts

201560004.Text: I didn't even agree to listen

201560006.Text: I'm currently eavesdropping on two swords whispering at each other

201560007.Text: But they are being pretty loud

201560008.Text: So, I don't think I'm eavesdropping

201560009.Text: The broadsword is saying that its master is a silly boy who can't do anything right

201560010.Text: The short sword is saying that its master is a witty girl who has amazing culinary skills

201560011.Text: Not long ago, the girl accompanied the silly boy on an adventure. They met a master swordsman and wanted to learn from him, but the master refused to teach them anything.

201560012.Text: Unless they make him gourmet food for 10 days straight, with a different dish every day

201560014.Text: I mean, did they succeed in learning anything?

201560015.Text: I'm still listening to their conversation

201560016.Text: They are saying that the two teamed up and served the master Beggar's Chicken

201560017.Text: Oh, and they made steamed tofu

201560025.Text: I'm going to buy some snacks, then I'll be back to listen to the story

201560026.Text: ...No, not a story. It's the thoughts of these swords

201560027.Text: I'm getting hungry too! Buy some for me as well!

Choices.Text: I didn't even agree to listen

201570002.Text: Train? I'm down to train anything

201570003.Text: I was too busy yesterday. I have to train today!

201570005.Text: I hate missing a day of training

201570008.Text: Uhh... You want me to be your human punching bag?

201570010.Text: I wouldn't dare! You are my respected adversary

201570011.Text: You want me to fight you?

201570013.Text: I know a great place to train. I know you'll love it

201570014.Text: They have 300 different weight options for barbells!

201570015.Text: Their treadmills run as fast as comets!

201570016.Text: Their punching bags are as firm as Qlipoth!

201570017.Text: Just one day here and all your worries will melt away!

201570019.Text: I can't wait. I'm on my way

201570024.Text: Send me a message if you want to join

201570025.Text: You can bring some friends if you like

Choices.Text: You want me to fight you?

201580002.Text: Drink? I'm always down to drink

201580003.Text: I didn't know the Luofu had Whale-Tide Spring lattes

201580005.Text: Yes! Coffee! I need a boost!

201580006.Text: Nah, I'm worried it'll keep me awake

201580007.Text: Himeko's coffee gave me an internal injury. I'll pass

201580015.Text: I should have brought my own pot

201580017.Text: I can't wait. I'm on my way

201580019.Text: Honestly, I found it strange at first, too

201580020.Text: But I've been so busy with military work lately. I need it to keep my brain awake or I just don't function properly

201580021.Text: All done. Now I'm happy. I'm heading back now

201580022.Text: I've still got hundreds of meetings and thousands of battles to deal with

Choices.Text: I'm worried it'll keep me awake

201590004.Text: Play? I'm always down to play

201590006.Text: It'll be fun, exciting, and good exercise for military extrapolation

201590008.Text: I'm sure with your skills, you're bound to get a top score

201590009.Text: The Astral Express Team is coming for victory!

201590010.Text: It will be a wonderful showdown!

201590012.Text: Of course. I wouldn't miss a fun competition like that

201590014.Text: That's a secret. Come and you'll find out!

201590015.Text: The Yaoqing often holds national competitions like these. I attend all the time

201590016.Text: It's the taking part that counts!

201590017.Text: When I first joined the Verdant Knights, we had these events every month. I miss those days!

201590018.Text: Alright, let me know if you want to take part

201600000.Text: Don't get angry, don't be hasty, workplace troubles never cease. Who can replace me if I get sick?

201600005.Text: Ah, I'm just trying to comfort myself.

201600006.Text: The Commission used to have a "six days a week, twelve hours a day" work routine. Those who didn't honor it were branded "bad team players" and even forced to quit

201600007.Text: But this actually ended up reducing productivity as opposed to motivating people

201600008.Text: So I'm once again arguing with people who support this system

201600009.Text: Woah, I didn't know they had something terrible like that...

201600011.Text: I'm so lucky with the Astral Express...

201600013.Text: {NICKNAME}, you have traveled far and seen many worlds. Do you have any advice you can offer me?

201600014.Text: Attack head on and lay your cards on the table

201600015.Text: I know lots of people will support you!

201600016.Text: Indeed, I will not disappoint the alchemists' high expectations of me

201600017.Text: Think of the big picture and don't fall into traps

201600018.Text: Indeed. This is not something that I can change overnight. I shall need to think more long-term

201600019.Text: As the Galactic Baseballer, I suggest using a physical approach! Direct, swift, and effective!

201600020.Text: I am not talented with martial arts. I fear this approach will not be of any use to me. Although, they do say that desperate times call for desperate measures...

201600021.Text: Thank you for your suggestion. I feel a lot more relaxed after speaking with you~

201600022.Text: Feel free to come and speak to me next time you need to get something off your chest!

201610000.Text: Attachment: "Alchemic Wisdom: A Hundred Thousand Must-Know Health Tips for Galactic Travelers (First Edition)"

201610001.Text: {NICKNAME}, the Alchemy Commission recently compiled a series of health education books

201610002.Text: They were written with the idea that, as interstellar travelers are faced with very complex living environments, an all-round health maintenance manual would make such journeys more comfortable and safe

201610003.Text: But I'm not sure if there is actually a market for this. I'd like to hear your thoughts

201610005.Text: Just the guidance that we need!

201610006.Text: Seems like we do have an audience

201610007.Text: Don't you think a hundred thousand is a few too many?

201610008.Text: Just looking at the name puts me off

201610010.Text: One hundred should be the absolute max

201610011.Text: First, I don't care for self care

201610012.Text: Plus, do you really think this content is suitable for travelers who spend all their time living outdoors?

201610013.Text: There is actually content on that, as well

201610014.Text: Do you have any other suggestions?

201610015.Text: For example, {NICKNAME}, what kinds of troubles do you run into as an interstellar traveler?

201610016.Text: I often find it hard to acclimatize to new planets

201610017.Text: Learning to condition your body to adapt to new environments quickly is indeed an important topic

201610018.Text: I often get injured by strange monsters

201610019.Text: How to quickly prepare commonly used ointments and treatments for external wounds is indeed an important topic

201610021.Text: Hmm... Looks like the Express already has a pretty well-rounded health manual

201610022.Text: I knew you were the best person to ask. Thanks

201610023.Text: I'll add your suggestions to the manuscript. If you have any other opinions or suggestions, make sure you let me know, okay~

201620000.Text: {NICKNAME}, I recently prepared a new batch of incense

201620001.Text: Some of them I feel would be well suited for use while traveling. Do you usually burn incense?

201620003.Text: I see, then I'd love to get your opinion~

201620004.Text: Unfortunately, I don't like the smell of incense

201620005.Text: This batch was created with the latest technology that massively reduces the uncomfortable smokiness. Why not hear me out?

201620006.Text: There is a proper order within a scent profile that must be considered  with top notes, middle notes, and base notes

201620007.Text: Different people require different combinations of fragrances for perfect harmony

201620008.Text: For instance, Miss March 7th has a sweet and fresh aroma, like peach blossom in full springtime bloom. She would be most suited to incense with the essence of hundreds of flowers to maintain her youth and dispel the weariness of ages

201620009.Text: Another example would be Mr. Dan Heng. His demeanor is cold and aloof, but for those who struggle with issues from the past, nothing could be more comforting than incense obtained from Scalegorge deepsea ore. It eases the mind and prevents distracting thoughts

201620010.Text: As for the esteemed navigator Miss Himeko, who I have admired for so long, I can only imagine that she is a woman of elegance and fine fragrance. This incense, derived from alien crystals, is capable of washing away fatigue and preserving her beauty

201620011.Text: Also, I hear Mr. Yang is an extremely stable and reliable person. This incense derived from Xianzhou spring tea allows him to focus his mind on both meditation and creative work

201620012.Text: I'm sure they'll all be grateful!

201620014.Text: {NICKNAME}... I've thought long and hard about what kind of incense would suit you

201620015.Text: Unlike the majority of people I have met, your fragrance is elusive and hard to put a finger on. There has always been a lingering hint of mystery about you

201620016.Text: Rushing in and selecting an unsuitable incense for someone would only be counterproductive. {NICKNAME}, are there any scent profiles that you enjoy?

201620017.Text: I like the scent of mung bean soda!

201620018.Text: Well, that is uncommon... There aren't many people who can stand that smell even among the Xianzhou natives...

201620019.Text: However, we are actually planning to create incense with such authentic Xianzhou scents~

201620020.Text: I like the scent of cycranes!

201620021.Text: Now you have me a little stumped...

201620022.Text: You mean the sort of fragrance that makes people feel warm, safe, and punctual, right? Let me do some research~

201620023.Text: I can't think of anything for now. I'll have a think

201620025.Text: I'll have the incense I mentioned sent to the Express soon. I hope you like them~

Choices.Text: Not a huge fan of the smell
I thank you on their behalf!

201630001.Text: I would like to know what you do for work. It is my duty to know.

201630003.Text: That's not me. I didn't do anything. What are you accusing me of?

201630007.Text: Are you coming to capture me?

201630009.Text: No, that's not me. What do you mean?

201630013.Text: Well, what do you do for work?

201630015.Text: So, besides picking up trash and delivering courier packages, your job also involves supervising cycrane operations?

201630017.Text: Wait, how did you know that? Where did you see that?

201630018.Text: How come I didn't see you???

201630021.Text: I could be in the trashcan.

201630022.Text: So, I would like to remind you not to overlook your enemies who may be lurking in the darkness.

Choices.Text: What do you do for a living?

201640001.Text: Where is the Astral Express' front door?

201640002.Text: I mean, how do I get inside the Express?

201640005.Text: Why? You want to rob the Express?

201640007.Text: The general has ordered me to rest.

201640008.Text: You want to rest on our Express?

201640009.Text: You can get a pretty good sleep on the Express, that's true

201640010.Text: I am not going in order to sleep.

201640012.Text: I wish the Express conductor would order me to get some rest too

201640013.Text: Is she? If you say so.

201640014.Text: This was an order. I must follow it.

201640015.Text: I hear that the Astral Express travels all over the universe.

201640016.Text: I am certain that it will need a cleaner.

201640018.Text: This is your idea of rest? Doing housework?

201640020.Text: Cleaning and eradicating dirt relaxes me and brings me joy.

201640021.Text: Come right over then. We definitely need the cleaning!

201640023.Text: You're trying to steal our conductor's job?

201640024.Text: Your Express conductor can take a rest.

201640025.Text: Fear not. Cleaning and eradicating dirt relaxes me and brings me joy.

201640026.Text: In my eyes, that is rest.

201640027.Text: Then come on over. I know Pom-Pom would welcome you happily

201640029.Text: I was going to go over there anyway.

201640030.Text: Jiaoqiu told me to go in from the front entrance.

201640031.Text: However, that is not my normal style.

201640032.Text: Therefore, I decided to ask you first in the interest of courtesy.

201650000.Text: Have you ever tried to assassinate your superior on the Astral Express before?

201650004.Text: We have a conductor, but no leader

201650006.Text: Assassinate!? Why would I assassinate the conductor?

201650009.Text: It seems that you have a very simple relationship between you.

201650010.Text: That is unlike my work. Here, we have grudges, debts of gratitude, superiors and juniors, and lunch friends.

201650012.Text: The less I know, the better

201650014.Text: I have attempted sneak attacks, traps, and public duels, but they have all failed.

201650015.Text: If you have no experience, I can report that back.

201650017.Text: Report back to General Feixiao that you have no experience with assassinating your superiors.

201650019.Text: That's a bold suggestion! I have to respect her

201650020.Text: That's crazy! Why would you accept that suggestion?

201650021.Text: I think that studying is always a good idea.

201650022.Text: However, assassination techniques are all about expertise, not quantity.

201650024.Text: Thank you for your response. I shall ask someone else.

201730000.Text: I realized there are a variety of music genres in the phonograph in the car, {F#Miss}{M#Mr.} {NICKNAME}

201730001.Text: Wildfire exudes an indomitable spirit. I believe the inhabitants of that ice-covered planet had bravely fought for their very survival

201730009.Text: Since she left our hometown, I've been caught up in various matters and haven't played the piano in a long time

201730010.Text: Is there something you'd like to listen to? I can take this opportunity to re-acquaint myself with the piano's techniques

201730013.Text: I need some time to think

201730015.Text: My sister's voice is agile and gentle. If I were to replace her voice with pure melody, it may be hard to convey the message of the song

201730019.Text: Anything is fine, really. I am happy with any piece you play

201730020.Text: Then I shall not waste any more time. I'll start with the easiest

201730021.Text: What do you think of "White Night"?

201730022.Text: Recently, I've been repeatedly savoring the composition of that song. The layers are rich, and the melody ebbs and flows, as if one could see the radiant colors of the night in a dizzying trance... It's a musical experience I've never had before.

209980005.Text: Gallagher and Mikhail would've wanted to express their appreciation too, but I guess now I must convey it on their behalf.

209980006.Text: I remember when you all first arrived in Penacony, Gallagher was so nervous and hopeful after hearing of it. It's not every day that he gets that way.

209980007.Text: Don't let his laid-back demeanor deceive you. Every time he spoke with you, he'd carefully think through his words beforehand.

209980008.Text: Mikhail was the same way. If he could see how outstanding the younger generation is, he'd be thrilled.

209980009.Text: I didn't expect to see that side of Mr. Gallagher!

209980010.Text: If only they were still here...

209980011.Text: Their dream has come true, but they can no longer see it themselves...

209980013.Text: But there's no need to feel so down about it.

209980014.Text: Mikhail's wish has been fulfilled, and Gallagher kept his promise after a long and seemingly endless wait.

209980015.Text: The dream shouldn't rest on the shoulders of one person when it's a vision we all share.

209980016.Text: From Mikhail's grandfather, to Mikhail, to Gallagher, and now to you guys...

209980017.Text: They may have left us, but the dream of the Nameless continues to thrive. That's the greatest solace we can offer them.

209980018.Text: Eventually, you'll embark on a new journey. When you do, may you connect with more worlds and carry the dream of trailblazing across the Cosmos.

209980019.Text: Please take this token of our appreciation.

209990002.Text: How do you do? Are there new missions at the Realm-Keeping Commission?

209990003.Text: You and the members of the Express crew have been a great help with the many tasks previously entrusted to you. We are deeply grateful for your assistance.

209990004.Text: I am reaching out this time to update you, Mr. Yang, and Miss March on some follow-up situations.

209990005.Text: Do you remember the previous invitation for you and a few others to come to the Realm-Keeping Commission to identify suspicious individuals?

209990006.Text: You mean that time when March played detective, making wild guesses about one traveling merchant's background and whereabouts, but couldn't nail down a single solid answer?

209990007.Text: Yep, that's the one. Officer Jingyan even praised Miss March for her keen observation and unorthodox thinking during that incident. She mentioned that Miss March seemed like a natural for our line of work.

209990009.Text: It seems you may be too preoccupied elsewhere. I still remember how Miss March deduced the whereabouts of an outworlder back then.

209990010.Text: Officer Jingyan even praised Miss March for her keen observation and unorthodox thinking during that incident. She mentioned that Miss March seemed like a natural for our line of work.

209990011.Text: Believe it or not, I received an official notice jointly issued by the Ten-Lords Commission and the Cloud Knights. That blond merchant, Luocha, is indeed an unlawful character who infiltrated the Xianzhou!

209990012.Text: Miss March's deduction and Mr. Yang's intuition... have come true! The Express Crew truly is a group of hidden talents! Much admiration!

209990015.Text: Don't knock it, the official seal and signatures are all there. This is as real as they come.

209990016.Text: So what did that man do?

209990017.Text: I can't go into the specifics as it's still part of Xianzhou's internal affairs.

209990018.Text: But, given our tight relationship, I can spill a bit of the beans for you. The official document states that he was arrested on charges of "identity fraud and smuggling of dangerous bio-merchandise, among other crimes." The use of the expression "among other" is quite intriguing.

209990019.Text: Of course, I have received the directive from the Realm-Keeping Commission's general affairs office, requesting to commend and express gratitude to enthusiastic guests such as yourselves.

209990020.Text: I would like to express my own gratitude to you all, and deliver to you your well-earned remuneration.

209990021.Text: In that case, if there are tasks involving apprehending fugitives or pursuing criminals in the future, I hope you and the Express Crew can continue to make full use of your intuition!

209990022.Text: Stay safe, I shall take my leave!

Choices.Text: So what did that man do?

115030006.Text: In your coming journey, you might come across other Calyxes like this, and the reality data stored in different Calyxes may vary, so look out for that.

500100003.Text: That may be true, but don't underestimate the Express' capacity! We can carry as much luggage as you want!

500100005.Text: ...Seriously? Every passenger should have their personal possessions

500100006.Text: You need to prepare and have resources ready when you're adventuring... But I don't see any of that from you, {NICKNAME}. That won't do!

500100007.Text: You can't be this reckless! Mmm, come back when you can. Pom-Pom has something to say to you. Don't push it off!

Choices.Text: I pack light when I travel

500110001.Text: I'm still just average. I rank maybe third on the Express?

500110003.Text: It'll be hard not to improve when you've encountered so much

500110004.Text: There will be more wondrous experiences waiting for you in future adventures, {NICKNAME}

500110005.Text: It's easy to feel lost when your belly traveling alone on a journey of growth. Sometimes it's wise to reach out and ask outstanding seniors for advice. Their lights are like lighthouses on the night ocean, and are very hard to replace

500110006.Text: Ahh, typo typo! It's "you've been," not "your belly"!

500110007.Text: Hurry and come back to the Express when you can! It's easier with face-to-face communication

121190001.Text: {NICKNAME}, the hero who reverted the space station's crisis  is that you?

121190003.Text: Awesome! It took me so long to get your number

121190005.Text: Totally! It took me so long to get your number

121190006.Text: Um, I have something I want your help with

121190007.Text: Could we please have a chat the next time you drop by the Herta Space Station?

121190008.Text: Tell me what you want help with first

121190009.Text: It's hard to explain over text

121190010.Text: I'll tell you the general gist

121190011.Text: People only think of me when there's trouble

121190013.Text: It won't be for free. I'll pay you

121190014.Text: I found a weird simulation program that needs to be tested by folks with lots of combat experience

121190015.Text: I can't think of anyone more fitting than you. Please. I'll be waiting at the space station's master control zone

Choices.Text: Tell me what you want help with first
People only think of me when there's trouble
